content: Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Ekanas kws yog xeem Efalayees, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Lamas sau lub laaj roob Efalayees. Ekanas txiv hu ua Yelauhaas hab nwg yawm hu ua Elihus, Ekanas yog Tauhus tsev tuabneeg hab yog cuab Xufes.
Ekanas muaj ob tug quaspuj: Hanas hab Peninas. Peninas muaj mivnyuas, tabsis Hanas tsi muaj.

Ekanas naj xyoo caab tsaj huv lub nroog Lamas moog fij hab pehawm tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus huv lub nroog Silaus. Haufenis hab Finehas kws yog Elis ob tug tub yog povthawj ua tug TSWV teg num nyob huv.
Txhua zag kws Ekanas tua tsaj fij, nwg muab tej nqaj faib rua Peninas hab Peninas cov mivnyuas ib leeg ib co.
Txawm yog Ekanas nyam Hanas heev dlua los nwg tsuas faib ib qho rua Hanas xwb, rua qhov  tug TSWV tsi pub Hanas muaj mivnyuas.
Peninas kws nrug Hanas sis tw ua neej, nwg pheej txobthuam hab rhuav Hanas ntsejmuag, rua qhov tug TSWV tsi pub Hanas muaj mivnyuas.
Peninas pheej ua le nuav ib xyoos dlhau ib xyoos; thaus obtug nrug suavdlawg moog pehawm tug TSWV huv lub tuamtsev los Peninas pheej ua rua Hanas nyuaj sab hab quaj tsi xaav noj mov.

Ekanas kws yog tug quasyawg nug Hanas has tas, “Hanas, vim le caag koj pheej quaj? Vim le caag koj tsi noj mov le? Vim le caag koj nyuaj sab ua luaj? Koj tau kuv zoo tsi cuag le koj muaj kaum leej tub los?”

Muaj ib zag, thaus puab noj mov huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev huv lub nroog Silaus taag. Hanas ntxhuv sab heev, nwg txawm sawv tseeg, nwg thov tug TSWV hab quaj nca heev. Thaus ntawd tug povthawj Elis nyob quastsawg ntawm tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev lub qhovrooj ib saab.

Hanas coglug has tas: “Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, thov koj tsaa qhovmuag saib kuv kws yog koj tug ntxhais qhev! Thov koj pum kuv tej kev lwj sab hab hlub kuv! Thov koj ncu txug kuv hab pub kuv muaj ib tug tub! Kuv coglug rua koj has tas, kuv yuav muab tug tub ntawd fij rua koj, ua koj teg num moog taag nwg simneej hab yuav tsi chais nwg cov plaubhau le.”
Hanas thov tug TSWV ntev loo. Elis saib ntsoov Hanas lub qhovncauj.
Hanas thov Vaajtswv qhovncauj ua zug kais, tabsis tsi nov suab le. Yog le ntawd, Elis xaav has tas yog Hanas qaug cawv.
Elis txhaj has rua Hanas has tas, “Koj tseem yuav qaug cawv le ko moog txug thaus twg? Koj ca le tseg tsi xob haus cawv lawm!”
Hanas teb has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, tsi yog kuv qaug cawv, kuv tsi tau haus cawv! Kuv nyuaj sab heev, kuv taabtom thov Vaajtswv hab muab kuv tej kev nyuaj sab tso rua tug TSWV.
Koj tsi xob xaav has tas, kuv yog ib tug quaspuj kws tsi tsimtxaj. Kuv thov Vaajtswv le nuav tub yog vim kuv muaj kev nyuaj sab heev.”
Elis has tas, “Koj ca le moog tsev kaaj sab lug, hab thov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv pub rua koj lawv le koj thov nwg lawm.”
Hanas teb has tas, “Thov koj hlub kuv.” Ces Hanas txawm moog noj mov hab tsi nyuaj sab lawm.

Thaus kaaj ntug Ekanas hab nwg tsev tuabneeg sawv ntxuv lug pehawm tug TSWV taag, ces puab txawm rov qaab lug tsev rua huv lub nroog Lamas lawm. Ekanas nrug Hanas pw, hab tug TSWV ua lawv le Hanas tej lug thov.
Ces Hanas txawm xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub. Nwg muab tug mivtub ntawd tis npe hu ua Xamuyees,  rua qhov Hanas has tas, “Kuv thov tug TSWV pub tug tub nuav rua kuv.”
Xyoo tom qaab rov txug lub caij kws Ekanas coj tsaj moog tua fij rua tug TSWV lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg, nwg hab nwg quaspuj mivnyuas txhaj rov qaab moog rua huv lub nroog Silaus.

Tabsis zag nuav Hanas tsi moog lawm. Hanas has rua nwg tug quasyawg has tas, “Kuv yuav tog kuas kuv tug mivtub tseg taug mig tsaiv, kuv maam le coj nwg moog rua huv tug TSWV lub tsev, hab ca nwg nyob huv moog taag nwg simneej le.”

Ekanas teb has tas, “Koj ca le ua lawv le koj pum zoo; koj nyob huv tsev moog txug thaus tug mivtub tseg taug mig tsaiv. Thov tug TSWV ua kuas koj  tej lug cog tseg tav.” Yog le ntawd, Hanas txhaj nyob huv tsev hab tu nwg tug mivtub xwb.

Thaus tug mivtub tseg taug mig lawm, Hanas txawm caab ib tug txiv nyuj noobnyoog peb xyoos,  ris ib tawb moov qeb, ib naab cawv txiv maab, hab coj nwg tug mivtub moog rua peg lub nroog Silaus. Txawm yog Xamuyees tseem yau heev los nwg ca le coj moog rua huv tug TSWV lub tsev kws nyob peg lub nroog Silaus.
Thaus puab muab tug txiv nyuj ntawd tua fij taag lawm, puab txawm coj tug mivtub moog cob rua Elis.
Hanas has rua Elis has tas, “Tug tswv, koj puas tseem ncu tau kuv lawm? Kuv yog tug quaspuj kws thaus koj pum tuaj sawv ntawm nuav thov tug TSWV ntaag.
Kuv thov tug TSWV pub tug mivtub nuav rua kuv, mas tug TSWV pub rua kuv lawv le kuv tej lug thov.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj muab kuv tug mivtub fij rua tug TSWV, ca nwg ua tug TSWV tuabneeg moog taag nwg simneej le.” Ces puab  txawm pehawm tug TSWV qhov ntawd.

Hanas hu nkauj has tas: “Tug TSWV ua rua kuv zoo sab kawg nkaus le; kuv zoo sab kawg kws tug TSWV pub rua kuv tau ntsejmuag! kuv khaav tau rua kuv tej yeebncuab; kuv zoo sab heev, rua qhov Vaajtswv paab kuv.
“Tsi muaj leejtwg dlawbhuv le tug TSWV; tsi muaj leejtwg sab zoo npaum le nwg, tsi muaj leejtwg tsomkwm peb le peb tug Vaajtswv.
Ca le tseg mej tej lug khaavtheeb, hab tseg mej tej lug khaav txiv, rua qhov tug TSWV yog tug Vaajtswv kws paub hab tshuaj txhua yaam kws tuabneeg ua.
Cov tubrog kws muaj zug heev tej neevnti tub luv taag lawm. Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws qaug zug rov muaj zug tuaj.

Tug tuabneeg kws txeev muaj noj muaj haus, nwgnuav nwg yuav tau moog ua zug noj, tabsis tug kws ibtxwm tsi muaj noj, muaj noj lawm. Tug quaspuj kws ibtxwm tsi muaj tub, yug tau xyaa leej tub; tabsis tug quaspuj kws muaj mivnyuas coob, tsi tshuav ib tug le lawm.
Tug TSWV ua kuas tuag hab ua kuas rov caj sa; nwg xaa tuabneeg moog rua huv tub tuag teb hab coj puab rov qaab lug.
Nwg ua rua ibtxha pluag hab ua rua ibtxha npluanuj; nwg muab ibtxha txu ua cov yau hab tsaa ibtxha ua cov luj.

Nwg tsaa cov tuabneeg pluag sawv huv tej moov aav lug, hab nwg tsaa cov tuabneeg txomnyem sawv huv qhov tshauv lug; nwg tsaa puab nrug tej numtswv nyob sis txig, hab pub puab tau koob meej. Tej ncej kws txheem lub nplajteb yog nwg le; nwg tsim lub nplajteb rua sau tej hauv ncej.
“Nwg tsomkwm nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws ncaaj nceeg, tabsis cov tuabneeg sab phem yuav pluj moog rua huv qhov tsaus ntuj nti; tuabneeg tug zug yeej paab tsi tau kuas tuabneeg dlim.

Tug TSWV cov yeebncuab yuav raug puamtsuaj; nwg ua rua xub nroo nrov nroo ntwg sau ntuj tuaj tawmtsaam puab. Tug TSWV yuav txav txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav. Nwg yuav pub fwjchim rua tug vaajntxwv kws nwg tsaa, nwg yuav pub kuas tug vaajntxwv kws nwg tsaa kovyeej tej yeebncuab.”
Ces Ekanas txawm rov qaab moog tsev rua nraag lub nroog Lamas lawm, tabsis tseg tug mivtub Xamuyees nrug tug povthawj Elis nyob peg lub nroog Silaus ua tug TSWV teg num.
Elis ob tug tub tsi xyum ua tuabneeg tsimtxaj. Obtug tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug

lossis tsi coj lawv le tej kevcai kws cov povthawj suavdlawg coj. Thaus cov pejxeem ib tug twg coj tsaj tuaj tua fij, tug povthawj ib tug tubkhai nqaa ib raab muv ncau peb ceg tuaj. Thaus tseem hau cov nqaj rua huv yag,

nwg txawm muab raab muv no cov nqaj huv yag, yog raab muv chob tau npaum le caag, ces cov nqaj ntawd yog tug povthawj tug. Puab ua le ntawd rua cov Yixalayees txhua tug kws caab tsaj tuaj tua fij rua huv lub nroog Silaus.

Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, thaus tseem tsi tau muab tej roj laws coj moog hlawv fij, tug povthawj tug tubkhai tuaj has rua tug kws muab tej tsaj fij has tas, “Kuv tuaj nqaa ib thooj nqaj moog rua tug povthawj ci noj; nwg tsi yuav cov nqaj kws koj tub hau sav lawm, nwg yuav nqaj nyoog xwb.”

Yog tug kws muab cov nqaj ntawd moog fij teb has tas, “Ca peb muab tej roj coj moog hlawv fij lawv le kevcai taag tsaiv, koj maam le nqaa tej nqaj kws koj xaav yuav moog.” Ces tug povthawj tug tubkhai teb has tas, “Tsi tau! Koj ca le muab rua kuv taamsim nuav, txawm yog koj tsi kaam los kuv yeej yuav nqaa moog.”
Tug TSWV pum has tas, Elis ob tug tub ua txhum luj kawg le, rua qhov obtug ua saib tsi taug tej khoom kws puab coj moog fij rua tug TSWV.
Thaus tug mivtub Xamuyees ua tug TSWV teg num, nwg naav lub tsho ntaub maag efaus.
Txhua xyoo kws nwg nam hab nwg txiv coj tsaj tuaj tua fij rua tug TSWV, nwg nam yeej xaws ib lub tsho ntev nqaa tuaj rua nwg.

Elis foom koob moov rua Ekanas hab Ekanas tug quaspuj has tas, “Thov tug TSWV pub kuas koj tug quaspuj nuav rov muaj dlua mivnyuas lug hloov tug tub kws koj muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm chaw.” Ces puab txawm rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Tug TSWV foom koob moov rua Hanas muaj peb tug tub hab ob tug ntxhais ntxiv. Tug mivtub Xamuyees luj hlub quas zug hab ua tug TSWV teg num.
Elis laug heev lawm, nwg nov tej kws nwg ob tug tub ua txhum rua cov Yixalayees, hab paub tej kws nwg ob tug tub moog ntxag cov quaspuj kws ua num ntawm tug TSWV lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib tej roojvaag.
Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj has rua obtug tas, “Vim le caag meb ua tej nuav? Txhua tug qha tej kev phem kws meb tau ua rua kuv noog.
Kuv ob tug tub, meb tseg tsi xob ua tej kev phem nuav lawm. Tej kev phem kws meb ua ntawd, tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg has ntshu nrooj rua luas nplajtog qaumpeg nov taag le.

Yog tuabneeg ua txhum rua tuabneeg, ces Vaajtswv phua tau plaub ntug rua obtug, tabsis yog tuabneeg ua txhum rua tug TSWV, leejtwg yuav ua tug phua plaub ntug?” Tabsis obtug tsi noog obtug txiv tej lug le, rua qhov tug TSWV tub npaaj sab lawm has tas yuav muab obtug tua povtseg.
Tug mivtub Xamuyees luj hlub ua lub neej hum tug TSWV sab hab hum tej tuabneeg suavdlawg sab.
Muaj ib tug cevlug coj tug TSWV tej lug tuaj has rua Elis has tas, “Thaus koj yawmkoob Aloos hab nwg tsev tuabneeg tseem ua Falaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv qhev, kuv tau lug tshwm rua Aloos pum.

Kuv tau xaiv nwg tsev tuabneeg ntawm txhua xeem Yixalayees lug ua kuv cov povthawj ua num ntawm lub thaaj fij, hlawv tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab, hab naav lub tsho efaus  tuaj cuag kuv. Kuv pub puab muaj feem yuav tau tej kws luas coj tuaj hlawv fij rua kuv sau lub thaaj ibtxha.

Yog le caag koj ua tuabneeg sab hlub  hab xaav tau tej kws kuv kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg coj tuaj fij? Elis, vim le caag koj muab koj ob tug tub saib hlub dlua saib kuv? Koj ca obtug muab tej nqaj zoo heev kws kuv tsaav tuabneeg coj tuaj fij rua kuv txaav kuas koj ob tug tub rog?

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv. Yaav taag lug kuv coglug has tas, koj tsev tuabneeg hab koj cov xeebntxwv yuav tau ua povthawj ua kuv teg num moog ibtxhis le. Tabsis nwgnuav kuv has rua koj tas, kuv tsi pub mej ua ntxiv lawm! Tug kws fwm kuv, kuv yuav pub rua nwg tau ntsejmuag, tug kws saib tsi taug kuv, kuv yuav ca nwg poob ntsejmuag.
Tub txug lub sijhawm lawm, kuv yuav tua cov tub hluas huv koj tsev tuabneeg hab huv koj cuab kwvtij. Yog le ntawd, koj tsev tuabneeg yuav tsi muaj ib tug txivneej nyob laug quas nkoog le.
Koj yuav mob sab hab khib  sab rua tej koob moov kws kuv foom rua lwm tug huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Tabsis koj tsev tuabneeg yuav tsi muaj ib tug nyob laug le.
Kuv yuav ca koj cov xeebntxwv ib tug ua neej nyob, nwg yuav ua ib tug povthawj ua kuv teg num. Tabsis nwg  yuav dligmuag hab taag kev ca sab, dlua le koj cov xeebntxwv yuav raug luas tua tuag taag.
Haufenis hab Finehas kws yog koj ob tug tub los yuav tuag rua tuab nub. Thaus ntawd koj yuav paub has tas tej lug kws kuv has nuav muaj tseeb tag.
Kuv yuav xaiv ib tug povthawj kws ncaaj nceeg ua kuv teg num hab ua txhua yaam lawv le kuv kuas nwg ua. Kuv yuav pub nwg muaj xeebntxwv lug ua num ntawm tug vaajntxwv kws kuv xaiv lawm lub xubndlag.
Koj cov xeebntxwv tseem yuav moog thov nyaj hab mov noj ntawm tug povthawj ntawd, hab tsaa ncauj thov kuas nwg pub puab paab cov povthawj ua num, puab txhaj tau noj.”
Elis qha tug mivtub Xamuyees ua tug TSWV teg num. Ntu ntawd tug TSWV tsi tshua lug has rua tuabneeg hab nwg tsi ua rua tuabneeg ua ywgtoog pum lawm.
Elis laug heev, nwg qhovmuag tsi tshua pum kev lawm. Muaj ib mos nwg pw huv nwg lub txaaj;
Xamuyees pw huv tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev ze ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg. Thaus tsi tau kaaj ntug kws lub teeb tseem cig laam lug,
tug TSWV hu Xamuyees. Xamuyees teb has tas “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Ces nwg txawm dlha moog nug Elis has tas, “Koj hu kuv los, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.” Tabsis Elis teb has tas, “Kuv tsi tau hu koj, ca le rov qaab moog pw.” Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txawm rov moog pw.

Tug TSWV rov hu Xamuyees dlua. Xamuyees tsi paub has tas yog tug TSWV, rua qhov tug TSWV tsi tau hu nwg dlua ib zag le. Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txhaj rov sawv moog rua ntawm Elis hab nug has tas, “Koj hu kuv los, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.” Elis teb has tas, “Kuv tug mivtub, kuv tsi tau hu koj, koj ca le rov qaab moog pw.”
Tug TSWV hu Xamuyees zag peb; Xamuyees sawv rov moog cuag Elis hab nug has tas, “Koj hu kuv los, kuv nyob ntawm nuav.” Thaus ntawd Elis paub has tas, yog tug TSWV hu Xamuyees.

Elis txhaj has rua Xamuyees tas, “Ca le rov moog pw; yog koj nov nwg rov hu koj dlua, ces koj teb has tas, ‘Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le has, koj tug tubkhai taabtom noog.’ ” Ces Xamuyees txawm rov moog pw lawm.
Tug TSWV lug sawv ntawd hab rov hu dlua ib yaam le nwg hu taag lug has tas, “Xamuyees! Xamuyees!” Xamuyees teb has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj ca le has, koj tug tubkhai taabtom noog.”
Tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Muaj ib nub kuv yuav ua ib yaam rua cov Yixalayees, txhua tug kws nov yuav ntshai heev.
Nub ntawd kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua Elis tsev tuabneeg lawv le tej lug kws kuv has thaus pib moog txug thaus xaus.

Kuv tub has rua Elis lawm has tas,  kuv yuav rau txim rua nwg tsev tuabneeg moog ibtxhis, rua qhov nwg ob tug tub has tej lug phem saib tsi taug kuv. Elis paub tej kws nwg ob tug tub ua, tabsis nwg tsi txwv obtug.
Yog le ntawd, kuv coglug has tas, tsi muaj ib yaam khoom fij lossis theej txhoj kws yuav theej tau Elis tsev tuabneeg lub txim luj ntawd le.”
Xamuyees pw tuabywv moog txug thaus kaaj ntug, nwg maam le sawv moog qheb tug TSWV lub tsev tej qhovrooj. Nwg ntshai qha zaaj ywgtoog ntawd rua Elis paub.
Elis hu has tas, “Kuv tug mivtub Xamuyees.” Xamuyees teb has tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Elis nug has tas, “Tug TSWV has le caag rua koj? Koj ca le pav rua kuv noog tsi xob zais ib lus le. Yog koj npog tsi qha rua kuv paub, Vaajtswv yuav rau txim nyaav rua koj.”
Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txhaj pav txhua yaam rua Elis noog, tsi zais ib lus le. Elis has tas, “Nwg yog tug TSWV, nwg yeej yuav ua lawv le nwg pum zoo.”
Thaus Xamuyees luj hlub lawm, tug TSWV nrug nraim Xamuyees hab ua kuas txhua yaam tav lawv le Xamuyees has ntawd.
Ces taagnrho cov Yixalayees thoob tebchaws paub has tas, Xamuyees yog tug TSWV ib tug cevlug tseeb.
Tug TSWV lug tshwm tsi tseg rua Xamuyees pum huv lub nroog Silaus, hab nrug Xamuyees thaam. Thaus Xamuyees has los cov Yixalayees noog nwg has.

Lub sijhawm ntawd, cov Filitees txhij tubrog tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, yog le ntawd,  cov Yixalayees txhaj moog tua cov Filitees. Cov Yixalayees moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm Enpenexes, hab cov Filitees tsuam yeej rua ntawm Afes.
Cov Filitees txawm tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, ces ob tog sis tua nyaav heev, cov Filitees tua ua rua cov Yixalayees swb hab tuag plaub txheeb leej rua huv tshaav rog.

Thaus cov Yixalayees kws seem rov lug txug rua huv puab lub yeej, cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj has tas, “Vim le caag nub nua tug TSWV ca cov Filitees tua yeej peb. Peb ca le moog kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg huv lub nroog Silaus tuaj, kuas nwg  txhaj nrug peb moog hab cawm kuas peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab teg.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog rua huv lub nroog Silaus, hab kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg kws yog tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus lub zwmtxwv kws nyob huv qaab ob tug qhelunpees  ob saab qaab tis, Haufenis hab Finehas kws yog Elis ob tug tub txhaj nrug cov kws kwv lub Phijxaab ntawd moog hab.
Thaus puab kwv lub Phijxaab moog txug, cov Yixalayees zoo sab hab qw nrov heev ua rua aav tseeg nkawg.

Thaus cov Filitees nov tej suab qw ntawd, puab has tas, “Peb ca le noog tej suab kws qw huv cov tuabneeg Henplais lub yeej! saib puab qw ua dlaabtsi?” Thaus cov Filitees paub has tas, yog cov Yixalayees kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg tuaj rua huv cov Henplais lub yeej lawm,
cov Filitees ntshai heev hab sis thaam has tas, “Vaajtswv tuaj rua huv puab lub yeej lawm! Peb yuav swb puab, peb tsi tau pum muaj dlua le nuav ib zag le.
Leejtwg yuav cawm tau peb dlim ntawm tej vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim le ntawd? Tej vaajtswv ntawd yog cov kws tua cov Iziv nraag taj suabpuam ntaag!
Cov Filitees, ca le ua sab tawv qhawv! Ca le tiv tua tag tag lossis yuav ca peb ua cov Henplais qhev, ib yaam le puab tau ua peb qhev lawm. Yog le ntawd, ca le tiv tua tag tsi xob thim!”
Cov Filitees txhaj tua heev ua rua cov Yixalayees swb kag, hab cov Yixalayees nyag taug nyag tsiv rov qaab moog tsev lawm. Cov tubrog Yixalayees raug luas tua tuag peb caug txheeb leej.
Cov Filitees txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab Elis ob tug tub kws yog Haufenis hab Finehas los raug luas tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog lawm.

Tuab nub ntawd, muaj ib tug txivneej kws yog xeem Npeenyamees tsiv huv tshaav rog lug txug huv lub nroog Silaus. Nwg tu sab heev, nwg txhaj dlua rhe nwg lub tsho hab tsuab moov aav rua sau nwg taubhau.

Elis nyob quastsawg sau ib lub rooj ntawm ntug kev saib ntsoov ncauj ke. Nwg txhawj txug lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg heev. Tug txivneej ntawd lug qha rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub nroog paub tej xwm ntawd, ces suavdlawg ntshai heev hab quaj zum zawg.
Thaus Elis nov suavdlawg quaj zum zawg, nwg nug has tas, “Tej suab ntawd yog suab dlaabtsi?” Tug txivneej ntawd dlha ceev nrooj lug qha rua Elis.
(Thaus ntawd Elis noobnyoog muaj cuaj caum yim xyoo, nwg qhovmuag pum kev tsi tseeb lawm.)
Tug txivneej ntawd has rua Elis has tas, “Nub nua kuv tsiv huv tshaav rog lug.” Elis nug has tas, “Mivtub, muaj xwm dlaabtsi?”

Nwg teb has tas, “Cov Filitees tua cov Yixalayees swb hab tawg tsiv taag. Koj ob tug tub kws yog Haufenis hab Finehas los raug tua tuag, hab luas tseem txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg huv tuabsi lawm.”

Thaus tug txivneej ntawd has txug lub Phijxaab, Elis txawm ntxeev hlo sau lub rooj rua saab tom qaab ntawm ib saab roojvaag, nwg cejdlaab luv ntho hab tuag lawm, vim nwg laug hab rog heev. Nwg ua cov Yixalayees tug thawjcoj tau plaub caug xyoo.

Elis tug nyaab kws yog Finehas tug quaspuj, taabtom suab mivnyuas hab yuav txug caij yug. Thaus nwg nov has tas, luas txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, nwg txiv yawm hab nwg tug quasyawg los tuag lawm, taamsim ntawd nwg mob plaab heev hab ca le yug kag mivnyuas.
Thaus nwg yuav tu sav, cov quaspuj kws tuaj paab nwg has rua nwg tas, “Ua tag tswj koj txujsa, koj tub tau ib tug mivtub lawm.” Tabsis nwg tsi noog hab tsi teb le.

Nwg tis tug mivtub ntawd npe hu ua Ikhanpaus,  txhais has tas “Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim tso cov Yixalayees tseg lawm.” Nwg has le ntawd, yog has txug qhov kws luas txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg lawm, nwg txiv yawm hab nwg tug quasyawg tuag.
Nwg has tas, “Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim tso cov Yixalayees tseg, rua qhov luas txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg lawm.”
Thaus cov Filitees txeeb tau lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg lawm, puab kwv ntawm Enpenexes moog rua huv lub nroog Asedaus,
hab coj moog tso rua huv lub tuamtsev kws puab teev puab tug vaajtswv Dankoos hab muab txawb rua ntawm tug mlom Dankoos ib saab.

Nub tom qaab sawv ntxuv, cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Asedaus pum tug mlom Dankoos qaug rua huv aav ntawm hauv ntej lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg. Yog le ntawd, puab muab tsaa hab txawb rua ntawm qhov qub chaw.

Taagkig tom qaab, puab tuaj pum tug mlom Dankoos rov qaug khwb rwg ntxig rua ntawm hauv ntej lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg. Zag nuav tug mlom ntawd lub taubhau hab ob saab npaab tu rua ntawm paws rooj tshuav lub cev xwb.
(Tub yog vim le ntawd, cov povthawj hab cov tuabneeg kws teev tug mlom Dankoos huv lub nroog Asedaus txhaj tsi tsuj hab tsi hlaa lub paws rooj ntawm lug txug naj nub nua.)

Tug TSWV rau txim nyaav heev rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Asedaus hab ua rua puab ntshai kawg le. Tug TSWV rau txim rua puab hab ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob cheebtsaam ntawd mob faaj  taag huv tuabsi.

Thaus cov tuabneeg ntawd, pum tej xwm nuav puab has tas, “Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv rau txim rua peb hab peb tug vaajtswv Dankoos lawm, peb ca le muab lub Phijxaab tshem moog, tsi xob ca nyob ntawm nuav lawm.”

Yog le ntawd, cov Filitees txawm tso tuabneeg moog hu puab tsib tug vaajntxwv tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Peb yuav ua le caag rua lub Phijxaab kws ntim cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg nuav?” Puab teb has tas, “Ca le kwv moog tso rua huv lub nroog Nkas.” Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj kwv lub phijxaab moog tso rua huv lub nroog Nkas kws yog cov Filitees ib lub nroog.

Tabsis thaus puab coj lub phijxaab moog tso rua huv lub nroog ntawd lawm, tug TSWV txawm rau txim rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog ntawd, hab ua rua puab ntxhuv sab kawg le. Tug TSWV rau txim nyaav heev rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog ntawd, tsi has tug laug tug hluas mob faaj taag huv tuabsi.

Ces puab txhaj kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg moog tso rua huv Ekiloos kws yog cov Filitees ib lub nroog; thaus coj lub Phijxaab moog txug huv lub nroog Ekiloos, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv qw zum zawg has tas, “Puab kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg tuaj ua kuas peb tuag taag xwb.”

Yog le ntawd, puab rov tso tuabneeg moog hu taagnrho cov Filitees cov vaajntxwv tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Peb ca le xaa lub Phijxaab kws ntim cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg rov qaab moog tso rua qhov chaw qub, kuas lub Phijxaab ntawd txhaj tsi tua peb hab peb tej tsev tuabneeg lawm.” Muaj kev ntxhuv sab thoob plawg rua txhua lub nroog, rua qhov Vaajtswv rau txim nyaav heev rua puab.
Cov kws tsi tuag los mob faaj taag huv tuabsi, puab txhaj quaj thov puab tej vaajtswv paab puab.
Thaus lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, nyob huv tebchaws Filitees tau xyaa lub hlis,

Cov Filitees txawm hu puab cov povthawj hab cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib yaig tuaj hab nug has tas, “Peb yuav ua le caag rua lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg nuav? Yog peb xaa rov qaab, peb yuav muab dlaabtsi xaa nrug moog?”

Puab teb has tas, “Yog mej yuav xaa lub Phijxaab kws ntim cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg rov qaab, mej yuavtsum muab ib cov khoom xaa nrug moog dlaws mej tej kev txhum. Tsi xob xaa lub Phijxaab rov qaab moog dlawb moog dlo. Mej ua le nuav, mej tej mob txhaj yuav zoo, hab mej txhaj yuav paub has tas, vim le caag tug TSWV txhaj rau txim rua mej.”

Cov pejxeem nug has tas, “Peb yuav muab dlaabtsi moog rua nwg?” Puab teb has tas, “Muab tsib thooj kub ua kuas zoo le tsib lub faaj hab tsib tug tsuag, ib tug tsuag kub hab ib lub faaj kub rua cov Filitees ib tug vaajntxwv, rua qhov tuab yaam mob nuav kis rua mej hab mej tsib tug vaajntxwv ntawd.

Mej yuavtsum muab kub nchuav ua kuas zoo le cov faaj hab zoo le cov tsuag kws tsimtxom mej lub tebchaws, hab mej yuavtsum fwm cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, tej zag nwg yuav tsi rau txim rua mej, mej tej vaajtswv hab mej lub tebchaws.

Vim le caag mej lub sab tawv ib yaam le Falaus kws kaav tebchaws Iziv hab cov Iziv? Mej tsi ncu has tas, tom qaab kws Vaajtswv rau txim nyaav rua puab, puab txhaj tso cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv moog los?
Yog le ntawd, mej txua ib lub tsheb nyuj tshab hab muab ib nkawm maum nyuj kws tsi tau hai dlua tsheb le; muab ob tug maum nyuj ntawd hai lub tsheb hab muab ob tug mivnyuas cais rua huv nkuaj.

Muab lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, tsaws rua sau lub tsheb nyuj, muab cov tsuag kub hab cov faaj kub kws mej npaaj moog dlaws mej tej kev txhum tso rua ntawm lub Phijxaab ib saab, hab tso ob tug maum nyuj hai lub tsheb ntawd moog.

Mej saib, yog ob tug nyuj ntawd hai lub tsheb moog rua huv lub nroog Npethes Semes, ces yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tso kev puamtsuaj luj kawg nkaus lug rua peb. Tabsis yog ob tug nyuj tsi hai lub tsheb moog rua huv, ces peb paub has tas tsi yog nwg tso kaab mob lug rua peb; tsuas yog peb mob tawm thawj xwb.”
Ces puab txawm ua le ntawd, puab txhaj muab ib nkawm maum nyuj lug hab tis lub tsheb rua, hab muab ob tug mivnyuas kaw rua huv nkuaj.
Puab muab lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, hab lub thawv kws ntim cov tsuag kub hab cov faaj kub tsaws rua sau lub tsheb nyuj.

Ces ob tug maum nyuj txawm taug txuj nam kev ncaaj nraim moog rua huv lub nroog Npethes Semes, too hauv li tsi lem moog rua saab txhumphem lossis saab xis le. Cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv caum ob tug maum nyuj ntawd qaab moog txug ndlua ntawm lub nroog Npethes Semes tug nrimteb.
Thaus ntawd cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Npethes Semes taabtom hlais nplej huv lub zeeg taj teb, tog nwm puab pum dlheev lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, puab zoo sab heev.

Lub tsheb nyuj lug txug rua ntawm ib tug txivneej kws hu ua Yausuas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npethes Semes thaaj teb, hab nreg ze rua ntawm ib lub pobzeb luj. Ces puab txawm muab lub tsheb nyuj phua ua tawg hab muab ob tug maum nyuj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.

Cov Levis tsaws lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab lub thawv kws ntim cov tsuag kub hab cov faaj kub lug txawb rua sau lub pobzeb luj ntawd. Ces cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Npethes Semes txhaj tua tsaj hlawv fij hab muab lwm yaam fij rua tug TSWV.
Cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv saib ntsoov cov Yixalayees ua le ntawd, ces nub ntawd cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv txawm rov qaab lug rua huv lub nroog Ekiloos lawm.

Cov Filitees xaa tau tsib lub faaj kub moog fij rua tug TSWV dlaws puab tej kev txhum, ib lub rua lub nroog Asedaus, ib lub rua lub nroog Nkaxas, ib lub rua lub nroog Asekeloos, ib lub rua lub nroog Nkas hab ib lub rua lub nroog Ekiloos;

hab tsib tug tsuag kub rua cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv kws kaav cov nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv hab tej zog kws tsi muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv. Lub pobzeb luj kws luas txawb lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg rua sau, tseem nyob huv Yausuas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npethes Semes thaaj teb lug txug naj nub nua, ua timkhawv qha has tas, muaj tej xwm nuav tag.

Tug TSWV tua cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog Npethes Semes tuag xyaa caum leej, rua qhov puab moog xauj lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg. Tej tuabneeg quaj ntsuag, rua qhov tug TSWV tua puab cov tuabneeg tuag ntau leej.

Yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Npethes Semes has tas, “Leejtwg txhaj muaj cuabkaav sawv taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog tug Vaajtswv dlawbhuv? Peb yuav muab nwg xaa moog tso rua qhov twg, kuas nwg nyob nrug dleb ntawm peb?”

Puab txhaj tso tuabneeg moog has rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Kili-as Ye-alees has tas, “Cov Filitees tub xaa lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg rov tuaj lawm, mej ca le tuaj kwv moog.”

Yog le ntawd, cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Kili-as Ye-alees txhaj tuaj kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg moog tso rua huv Anpinadas lub tsev sau laaj roob. Puab muab Anpinadas tug tub Ele-axas ua kevcai ntxuav hab tsaa nwg ua tug saib lub phijxaab.
Lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg nyob huv lub nroog Kili-as Ye-alees tau ntev loo kwvlaam le neeg nkaum xyoo. Lub sijhawm ntawd cov Yixalayees quaj thov tug TSWV paab puab.

Xamuyees has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Yog mej rov muab sab npuab tug TSWV tag, mej yuavtsum tso lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv hab tug mlom quaspuj Atates tseg. Muab mej fij rua tug TSWV hab pehawm nwg tuab leeg xwb, nwg txhaj yuav cawm mej dlim ntawm cov Filitees txhais teg.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj muab puab tug mlom Npa-aas hab tug mlom quaspuj Atates tso tseg, hab pehawm tug TSWV tuab leeg lawm xwb.
Xamuyees hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees tuaj txoos ua ke rua huv lub nroog Mixepas hab nwg has rua puab tas, “Kuv yuav thov tug TSWV paab mej.”

Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj tuaj sis sau rua huv lub nroog Mixepas. Puab moog cug dlej lug laub fij rua tug TSWV hab ua kevcai yoo mov ib nub tsaus ntuj ndlais. Puab leeg has tas, “Peb tau ua txhum rua tug TSWV lawm tag” (Xamuyees pib tu plaub rua cov Yixalayees huv lub nroog Mixepas.)

Thaus cov Filitees nov has tas, cov Yixalayees tuaj sis sau rua huv lub nroog Mixepas, cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv txawm txhij tubrog tuaj tua cov Yixalayees. Thaus cov Yixalayees nov le ntawd, puab ntshai heev,
hab puab has rua Xamuyees tas, “Koj ca le thov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv paab peb, peb txhaj tsi poob rua cov Filitees teg.”
Xamuyees muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj tua hlawv taagnrho fij rua tug TSWV. Nwg thov tug TSWV paab cov Yixalayees, hab tug TSWV teb nwg tej lug thov.

Thaus Xamuyees taabtom hlawv tsaj fij rua tug TSWV, cov Filitees tub tuaj ze hab yuav tua cov Yixalayees lawm; tabsis taamsim ntawd tug TSWV ua rua xub nroo nrov nroo ntwg sau ntuj tuaj rua cov Filitees. Ua rua puab xaav tsi thoob hab tsiv taag rov qaab moog tsev lawm.
Cov Yixalayees txhij tubrog huv lub nroog Mixepas caum tua cov Filitees taug kev moog yuav laug txug lub nroog Npethekas.

Xamuyees muab ib lub pobzeb lug teeb rua ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Mixepas hab lub nroog Sees hab has tas, “Tug TSWV paab peb lug txug ntawm nuav.” Nwg txhaj tis lub pobzeb ntawd npe hu ua “Pobzeb Cawm Sav.”
Yog le ntawd, cov Filitees txhaj swb cov Yixalayees hab tug TSWV tsi pub cov Filitees hlaa cov Yixalayees tug nrimteb tuaj tua puab moog taag Xamuyees simneej.

Cov Yixalayees tau taagnrho tej nroog kws cov Filitees txeeb tau lawm, txij ndlua lub nroog Ekiloos moog rua lub nroog Nkas rov lug; Yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj tau taagnrho puab cheebtsaam aav rov lug ua puab tug. Cov Yixalayees hab cov Kana-aas txhaj nyob sis humxeeb tsi ua tsuv tsi ua rog lawm.
Xamuyees kaav cov Yixalayees moog taag nwg simneej le.
Nwg naj xyoo moog tu suavdlawg tej plaub ntug kws tsi sis hum huv lub nroog Npethees, lub nroog Nkilenkas hab lub nroog Mixepas.
Tom qaab ntawd, nwg maam le rov lug tsev rua huv lub nroog Lamas, nwg ua tug tu plaub ntug huv lub nroog ntawd hab. Xamuyees ua tau ib lub thaaj fij rua huv lub nroog Lamas rua tug TSWV.
Thaus Xamuyees laug heev lawm, nwg tsaa nwg ob tug tub tu plaub ntug rua cov Yixalayees.
Tug tub hlub hu ua Yau-ees hab tug tub yau hu ua Anpiyas; obtug tu plaub ntug huv lub nroog Npesenpas.
Tabsis obtug tsi ua lub neej zoo le obtug txiv. Obtug tsuas ntshaw txujkev nrhav nyaj xwb, obtug txhaj yuav tej nyaj kws luas coj tuaj xab hab obtug tsi tu plaub kuas ncaaj rua suavdlawg.
Cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj tuaj sis sau hab moog cuag Xamuyees huv lub nroog Lamas,

hab has rua nwg tas, “Nwgnuav koj laug heev lawm, koj ob tug tub tsi coj hab ua lawv le koj ua. Yog le ntawd, thov koj tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav peb, kuas peb muaj vaajntxwv ib yaam le luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg muaj hab.”
Xamuyees tsi pum zoo qhov kws cov Yixalayees thov nwg tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav puab. Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txhaj thov tug TSWV,
hab tug TSWV teb has tas, “Koj ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws cov pejxeem has rua koj. Puab tsi yog tso koj tseg xwb, tabsis puab tso kuv kws yog puab tug vaajntxwv tseg lawm hab.

Txij thaus kuv coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, puab yeej tsi muab sab npuab kuv hab pheej moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv; nwgnuav puab taabtom ua rua koj ib yaam le puab ua rua kuv ntaag.
Koj ca le ua lawv le puab thov, tabsis koj yuavtsum ntuag puab tawv qhawv hab qha kuas puab paub has tas, cov vaajntxwv ntawd yuav kaav puab le caag.”
Xamuyees txhaj qha txhua yaam rua cov pejxeem kws tuaj thov nwg tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav puab, lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees lawm.

Xamuyees has rua puab tas, “Mej tug vaajntxwv yuav kaav mej le nuav: Nwg yuav coj mej tej tub moog ua tubrog, ibtxha yuav ua tubrog tsaav tsheb neeg, ibtxha yuav ua tubrog caij neeg hab ibtxha yuav dlha ua vaajntxwv tej tsheb neeg ntej.

Nwg yuav tsaa ibtxha saib ib txheeb leej, hab ibtxha saib tsib caug leej. Mej cov tub yuav moog laij nwg tej laj tej teb hab sau nwg tej qoobloo, puab yuav ntaus ntaaj ntaus rag hab ntaus cuabyeej ua rog tiv thaiv nwg tej tsheb neeg.
Mej tej ntxhais yuav moog tov tshuaj tsw qaab rua nwg, ua zaub mov hab ci ncuav rua nwg noj.
Nwg yuav txeeb mej tej laj tej teb kws zoo, tej vaaj txiv maab hab txiv ntoo roj rua nwg cov numtswv yuav.
Nwg yuav sau mej tej qoobloo hab tej txiv maab ib feem kaum rua nwg cov thawj tubrog hab cov numtswv.
Nwg yuav txeeb mej tej tubkhai, tej nyuj  hab tej neeg luav kws zoo moog ua nwg tej num.
Nwg yuav sau mej tej tsaj txhu ib feem kaum rua nwg yuav hab mej yuav tau ua nwg qhev.
Thaus ntawd mej yuav tshev hab ywg mej tug vaajntxwv kws mej xaiv, tabsis tug TSWV yuav tsi noog mej tej lug ywg le.”
Cov pejxeem tsi noog Xamuyees has le, puab has tas, “Peb tsi noog koj has, peb xaav tau ib tug vaajntxwv,
kuas peb txhaj yuav zoo ib yaam le luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg. Peb tug vaajntxwv yuav kaav peb, coj peb moog tua rog hab tawmtsaam peb cov yeebncuab.”
Xamuyees noog tej lug kws puab has ntawd, nwg coj zaaj nuav moog pav qha rua tug TSWV.
Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Koj ca le ua lawv le puab thov hab tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv rua puab.” Ces Xamuyees txhaj kuas cov Yixalayees rov qaab moog tsev.

Muaj ib tug txivneej kws yog xeem Npeenyamees hu ua Kises; nwg yog Anpiyees tug tub hab yog Xelaus tug xeebntxwv. Kises yog Npekaulas tsev tuabneeg hab yog Afiyas cuab. Kises yog ib tug tuabneeg npluanuj hab muaj koob meej nto moo lug.
Nwg muaj ib tug tub hu ua Xa-ules kws zoo nraug ntxag hab muaj zug khov kho. Xa-ules sab hab zoo nraug tshaaj cov Yixalayees txhua tug huv tuabsi.
Muaj ib nub Kises cov neeg luav ibtxha pluj lawm, nwg txawm has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj coj ib tug tubkhai nrug koj moog nrhav cov neeg luav.”

Obtug moog nrhav thoob plawg sau lub laaj roob Efalayees hab huv cheebtsaam Salisas, tabsis tsi pum cov neeg luav le. Yog le ntawd, obtug txhaj moog nrhav huv cheebtsaam Sa-alees los tsi pum cov neeg luav le. Ces obtug txhaj moog nrhav thoob plawg huv cheebtsaam Npeenyamees, tabsis tsi pum le hab.
Thaus obtug lug txug huv cheebtsaam Xufes, Xa-ules has rua nwg tug tubkhai has tas, “Wb ca le rov moog tsev; tej zag kuv txiv yuav txhawj wb tshaaj txhawj cov neeg luav lawm.”

Tug tubkhai teb has tas, “Tog mivntsiv tsaiv! Nyob huv lub nroog nuav muaj ib tug txivneej yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg kws suavdlawg fwm heev, nwg has le caag txawm muaj lawv le ntawd. Wb ca le moog cuag nwg, tej zag nwg yuav qha kev rua wb moog nrhav tau cov neeg luav.”
Xa-ules nug has tas, “Yog wb moog cuag nwg, wb yuav coj dlaabtsi moog rua nwg? Wb cov ncuav huv naab los taag lawm, wb tub tsi muaj dlaabtsi coj moog rua nwg le ne?”
Tug tubkhai teb has tas, “Kuv muaj ib lub nyaj, kuv maam le muab lub nyaj nuav rua nwg, ces nwg yuav qha kev rua wb moog nrhav tau cov neeg luav ntawd.”

Xa-ules teb has tas, “Koj cov lug ko yog ib zaaj tswvyim zoo, wb ca le moog cuag nwg.” Yog le ntawd, obtug txhaj moog rua huv lub nroog kws Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg nyob. Thaus obtug taabtom taug kev sau lub laaj roob yuav moog rua huv lub nroog, obtug ntsib ib paab ntxhais tuaj nqaa dlej, obtug nug cov ntxhais ntawd has tas, “Tug kws paub saib yaav tom ntej puas nyob huv tsev lawm?” (Tam ntawd luas hu tug cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, tug kws paub saib yaav tom ntej, yog leejtwg xaav nug Vaajtswv ib yaam dlaabtsi, nwg has tas, “Peb moog cuag tug kws paub yaav tom ntej.”)

Cov ntxhais ntawd teb has tas, “Nwg nyob los mas, nwg nyavnyuas dlhau plawg moog lawm, yog meb moog ceev nrooj meb yuav caum cuag nwg. Nwg taabtom moog rua huv lub nroog, rua qhov nub nua suavdlawg coj tsaj tuaj tua hlawv rua sau lub thaaj kws nyob peg laaj roob fij rua tug TSWV. Cov tuabneeg kws luas caw tuaj yuav tog nwg moog txug maam le noj mov. Rua qhov nwg yuavtsum thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua tej khoom fij ntawd tsaiv, suavdlawg maam le noj. Yog meb moog taamsim nuav meb txhaj yuav ntsib nwg, tsheem nwg tsi tau moog rua peg roob.”

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules hab tug tubkhai txhaj moog rua huv lub nroog, thaus obtug taabtom moog, obtug pum Xamuyees taug kev ncaaj nraim tuaj rua ntawm obtug, yuav moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws pehawm tug TSWV.
Ua ntej nub kws Xamuyees tsi tau moog rua huv lub nroog, tug TSWV tub xub has rua Xamuyees lawm has tas,

“Pigkig thaus taav lub caij nuav, kuv yuav khaiv ib tug tuabneeg kws yog xeem Npeenyamees tuaj cuag koj. Koj ca le muab roj laub rua nwg taubhau, tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, hab nwg yuav cawm kuas puab dlim ntawm cov Filitees txhais teg. Kuv tub pum kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej kev txomnyem hab nov puab tej lug thov lawm.”
Thaus Xamuyees pum dlheev Xa-ules, tug TSWV txawm has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav yog tug kws kuv qha rua koj ntaag, nwg yog tug yuav kaav kuv tsaav tuabneeg.”
Xa-ules moog rua ntawm Xamuyees thaus nwg nyob ze lub roojvaag hab nug has tas, “Koj puas paub tug kws paub saib yaav tom ntej nyob qhov twg? Thov koj qha rua kuv.”

Xamuyees teb has tas, “Tug kws paub saib yaav tom ntej yog kuv ntaag. Meb ca le ua kuv ntej moog rua peg lub chaw pehawm Vaajtswv. Nub nua meb moog nrug kuv noj mov peg. Pigkig sawv ntxuv kuv maam teb meb tej lug nug, hab meb maam rov moog tsev.

Meb tsi xob txhawj txug cov neeg luav kws tub pluj tau peb nub lawm, rua qhov luas tub nrhav tau lawm. Tabsis tug twg yog tug kws cov Yixalayees xaav yuav heev dlua?  Puab xaav yuav koj hab koj txiv tsev tuabneeg ntaag.”

Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv yog xeem Npeenyamees, yog xeem kws tsawg tshaaj plawg ntawm tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, hab kuv tsev tuabneeg yog tsev kws tsi tseemceeb le luas lwm tsev kws yog peb xeem Npeenyamees, ua caag koj has le ko rua kuv?”

Xamuyees coj Xa-ules hab Xa-ules tug tubkhai moog rua huv chaav tsev luj hab kuas obtug moog nyob peg hauv rooj kws yog tshwj rua cov qhua, taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntawd muaj kwvlaam le peb caug leej.
Xamuyees has rua tug kws ua zaub ua mov has tas, “Koj moog nqaa cov nqaj kws kuv kuas koj muab khaws tshwj tseg rua ib qho ntawd lug.”

Yog le ntawd, tug kws ua zaub ua mov txawm moog nqaa cegqaab kws muab tshwj tseg ntawd lug tso rua ntawm Xa-ules xubndlag. Xamuyees  has tas, “Cov nqaj nuav yog kuv tseg rua koj. Koj ca le noj. Cov nqaj nuav tseg rua koj noj thaus lub sijhawm nuav, nrug cov qhua kws kuv caw  tuaj.” Yog le nub ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj nrug Xamuyees noj mov ua ke.
Thaus puab rov ntawm qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv lug txug rua huv lub nroog, puab khu chaw rua Xa-ules  pw txheej tsev sau,
hab nwg txawm moog pw sau. Thaus kaaj ntug, Xamuyees hu Xa-ules kws pw txheej sau has tas, “Ca le sawv, kuv yuav xaa koj rov moog tsev.” Xa-ules sawv hab nrug Xamuyees tawm moog rua tom kev.

Thaus puab moog txug ntawm ntug nroog, Xamuyees has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj kuas tug tubkhai moog ua wb ntej.” Thaus tug tubkhai moog lawm, Xamuyees has tas, “Wb nyob ntawm nuav ib plag tsaiv, kuv yuav qha rua koj has tas, Vaajtswv has le caag rua kuv.”

Xamuyees txawm muab fwj roj laub rua Xa-ules taubhau, nwj nwg hab has tas, “Tug TSWV tsaa koj ua tug kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Koj yuav kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg hab cawm puab dlim ntawm puab cov yeebncuab txhais teg. Zaaj kws kuv has qha rua koj nuav yuav ua rua koj paub has tas, tug TSWV tau xaiv koj  ua tug kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Nub nua thaus koj ncaim kuv moog lawm, koj yuav ntsib ob tug txivneej ze Laxees lub ntxaa ntawm Xelexas huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav. Obtug yuav qha rua koj has tas, luas tub nrhav tau cov neeg luav kws koj tuaj nrhav lawm. Koj txiv tsi txhawj txug cov neeg luav, tabsis nwg txhawj koj heev, nwg nroo has tas, ‘Sov kuv tug tub moog rua qhov twg lawm, kuv yuav ua le caag txhaj zoo?’

Thaus koj dlhau ntawd moog txug ntawm tsob ntoo xeeb peg Tanpaus, koj yuav ntsib peb tug txivneej taabtom coj khoom tuaj fij rua Vaajtswv peg lub nroog Npethees. Peb tug txivneej ntawd, ib tug caab ib tug thaav tshis, ib tug nqaa peb lub ncuav, hab ib tug nqaa ib naab tawv cawv txiv maab.
Puab yuav hawm koj hab yuav muab ob lub ncuav rua koj. Koj ca le txais ob lub ncuav ntawd.

Dlhau ntawd moog, thaus koj moog txug sau Vaajtswv lub Roob ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as qhov chaw kws cov Filitees tsuam yeej. Koj yuav ntsib ib paab cev Vaajtswv lug ntawm lub roojvaag nroog, puab taabtom ntaus nkauj nogncaas luj, ntaus nruag npuaj, tshuab raaj hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas miv nqeg sau roob kws teeb lub thaaj fij lug. Puab seev cev hab qw zoo sab heev.
Thaus ntawd, Tug TSWV tug ntsujplig yuav lug kaav hlo koj lub sab, koj yuav nrug puab seev cev, qw zoo sab hab koj lub sab yuav hloov hlo tsi thooj le qub lawm.
Thaus muaj tej xwmtxheej nuav tshwm, koj yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le Vaajtswv qha koj ua.

Koj yuav ua kuv ntej moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, kuv yuav tuaj ntsib koj nraag hab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo rua tug TSWV. Koj nyob xyaa nub tog kuas kuv tuaj txug, kuv maam qha rua koj paub has tas, koj yuavtsum ua dlaabtsi.”
Thaus Xa-ules yuav ncaim Xamuyees moog, Vaajtswv tub hloov Xa-ules lub sab dlua tshab lawm. Nub ntawd txawm muaj txhua yaam tshwm lawv le Xamuyees tau has rua Xa-ules lawm.

Thaus Xa-ules hab nwg tug tubkhai lug txug huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as, muaj ib paab cev Vaajtswv lug txawm tuaj ntsib Xa-ules. Taamsim ntawd Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig lug kaav hlo Xa-ules lub sab, nwg txhaj nrug puab dlha seev cev hab qw zoo sab.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm paub Xa-ules pum nwg ua le ntawd, puab txawm sis nug has tas, “Dlaabtsi ua rua Kises tug tub ua le ntawd? Xa-ules txawm ca le ua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm hab los?”

Muaj ib tug txivneej nyob huv lub nroog ntawd nug has tas, “Cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd ne, puab txiv tsua yog leejtwg?” Tub yog vim le nuav, suavdlawg txhaj has tas, “Xa-ules txawm ua ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm hab los?”
Thaus Xa-ules seev cev hab qw zoo sab le ntawd taag, nwg txawm moog rua peg lub thaaj fij kws nyob sau lub laaj roob lawm.

Xa-ules tug yawm laug pum Xa-ules hab Xa-ules tug tubkhai, nwg nug obtug has tas, “Meb moog qhov twg lug?” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Wb moog nrhav neeg luav lug, wb nrhav tsi tau ces wb txawm moog cuag Xamuyees lawm.”
Xa-ules tug yawm laug nug has tas, “Nwg has le caag rua meb?”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Nwg has rua wb tas, luas tub nrhav tau cov neeg luav lawm.” Tabsis Xa-ules tsi qha rua nwg tug yawm laug paub txug qhov kws Xamuyees has tas, nwg yuav tau ua vaajntxwv le.
Xamuyees hu cov pejxeem tuaj sis sau pehawm tug TSWV huv lub nroog Mixepas,

nwg has rua puab tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Kuv coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, hab cawm mej dlim ntawm cov tuabneeg Iziv hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws tsimtxom mej.

Kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws cawm mej dlim ntawm mej txujkev txomnyem nyuaj sab, tabsis nub nua mej tso kuv tseg hab thov kuas kuv tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav mej. Yog le ntawd, mej txhua xeem hab txhua cuab ca le tuaj sis sau taabmeeg tug TSWV.’ ”
Xamuyees hu ib xeem quas zug lug, ces tug TSWV xaiv xeem Npeenyamees.

Xamuyees hu xeem Npeenyamees ib tsev quas zug lug, ces tug TSWV xaiv Matis tsev tuabneeg. Thaus Matis tsev tuabneeg cov txivneej lug,  ces tug TSWV xaiv Kises tug tub Xa-ules. Suavdlawg nrhav nwg, tabsis tsi pum nwg nyob qhov twg.
Puab nug tug TSWV has tas, “Nwg tuaj ntawm nuav los tsi tuaj?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Xa-ules tsiv nraim tom qaab cov naab rau khoom.”
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj moog coj Xa-ules lug cuag suavdlawg, hab puab pum has tas Xa-ules sab tshaaj suavdlawg huv tuabsi.
Xamuyees has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav yog tug kws tug TSWV xaiv! Peb cov nuav tsi muaj ib tug zoo le nwg le.” Hab suavdlawg qw has tas, “Thov kuas vaajntxwv muaj sa nyob ntev!”

Xamuyees qha vaajntxwv teg num hab tej kws vaajntxwv muaj cai ua rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg paub, hab nwg muab tej ntawd sau ca rua huv ntawv coj moog khaws tseg rua huv chaav kws pehawm Vaajtswv. Ces Xamuyees txawm kuas suavdlawg rov moog tsev.
Xa-ules los kuj rov moog tsev rua peg lub nroog Nkinpe-as lawm. Cov numtswv kws muaj fwjchim  kws Vaajtswv tshoov sab lawm los kuj nrug Xa-ules moog hab.
Tabsis muaj qee leej kws tsi thoob tsib to nrog has tas, “Tug txivneej nuav yuav paab tau peb le caag?” Puab has lug saib tsi taug Xa-ules, hab tsi muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua nwg le.

Tau ib hlis tom qaab, Vaajntxwv Nahas kws kaav tebchaws Amoos coj nwg cov tubrog tuaj vij hab tua lub nroog Yanpes huv cheebtsaam Nkile-as. Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yanpes has rua Nahas has tas, “Thov koj coglug rua peb, peb yuav ca koj kaav peb.”
Nahas teb has tas, “Kuv coglug rua mej los tau, tabsis ca kuv muab mej txhua tug lub qhovmuag saab xis kaus povtseg tsaiv, kuv maam coglug kuas cov Yixalayees poob ntsejmuag huv tuabsi.”
Cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog Yanpes teb has tas, “Thov ncua sijhawm xyaa nub rua peb, peb khaiv tuabneeg moog has thoob plawg tebchaws Yixalayees. Yog tsi muaj leejtwg paab peb, peb maam swb koj.”
Thaus cov tuabneeg xaa xuv moog txug huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as kws Xa-ules nyob, hab puab qha tej xwm nuav rua suavdlawg, ua rua suavdlawg ntshai hab tsaa suab hlo quaj.

Thaus ntawd Xa-ules taabtom caab nwg tug txiv nyuj nraag teb lug, nwg nug has tas, “Muaj xwm dlaabtsi? Vim le caag suavdlawg yuav quaj zum zawg le nuav?” Puab txhaj pav qhov kws cov tuabneeg xaa xuv peg lub nroog Yanpes tuaj ntawd rua Xa-ules noog.
Thaus Xa-ules nov tej xwm ntawd, Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig lug kaav hlo Xa-ules sab, nwg txhaj npautawg heev.

Nwg muab ob tug txiv nyuj tua kag, txav ua tej thooj hab muab rua ib cov tuabneeg xaa moog thoob plawg lub tebchaws Yixalayees, hab has rua suavdlawg has tas, “Yog leejtwg tsi nrug Xa-ules hab Xamuyees moog tua rog, yuav muab tug ntawd cov txiv nyuj tua hab txav ua tej thooj le nuav!” Cov Yixalayees ntshai nyob tsaam tug TSWV ua le caag rua puab, puab txhaj koom ua ib lub sab tuaj ua ke.
Xa-ules kuas suavdlawg tuaj sis sau rua huv Npexlees; cov Yixalayees muaj peb puas txheeb leej, hab cov Yudas muaj peb caug txheeb leej.

Puab has rua cov tuabneeg kws xaa xuv peg lub nroog Yanpes tuaj has tas, “Mej ca le rov moog has rua mej cov tuabneeg paub has tas, pigkig peb yuav tuaj paab kuas tau mej ua ntej taav su.” Thaus cov tuabneeg huv Yanpes nov le ntawd puab zoo sab heev
hab has rua Nahas has tas, “Pigkig peb maam le ua ib sab swb koj, koj yuav ua le caag rua peb los tau.”

Taagkig kaaj ntug txoog, Xa-ules muab cov tubrog faib ua peb paab, puab txawm mos tsaus tsi moog tua cov Amoos huv lub yeej hab puab sis tua ib taav su, Xa-ules cov tubrog tua cov Amoos tuag coob heev. Cov kws seem tuag, nyag taug nyag fuas kev tsiv lawm.

Cov Yixalayees has rua Xamuyees tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws has tas, puas tsimnyog ca Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv kaav peb, cov tuabneeg ntawd nyob qhov twg lawm? ca le nteg puab lug rua peb, peb yuav muab puab tua povtseg.”
Tabsis Xa-ules teb has tas, “Nub nua tsi xob muab ib tug twg tua povtseg, rua qhov nub nua yog nub kws tug TSWV cawm cov Yixalayees dlim.”
Ces Xamuyees has rua puab has tas, “Peb ca le moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, hab has qha rua suavdlawg paub ib zag ntxiv has tas, Xa-ules yog peb tug vaajntxwv.”

Yog le ntawd, puab suavdlawg txhaj moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, hab qha rua cov pejxeem suavdlawg paub has tas Xa-ules yog vaajntxwv. Puab muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV ua kev sis raug zoo, Xa-ules hab cov Yixalayees noj haus zoo sab kawg le.
Xamuyees has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Kuv tub ua tav lawv le mej thov, hab tsaa tau ib tug vaajntxwv kaav mej,
hab nwgnuav nwg yuav ua tug coj mej. Kuv laug plaubhau dlawb taag lawm, kuv tej mivnyuas puavleej nrug mej nyob. Kuv coj mej thaus kuv tseem hluas lug txug naj nub nua.

Tsheem kuv tseem nyob ntawm nuav, yog yaav taag lug kuv tau ua txhum qhov twg, ces mej ca le kom kuv rua tug TSWV hab tug vaajntxwv kws tug TSWV xaiv. Kuv puas tau nyag mej leejtwg tug nyuj lossis tug neeg luav? Kuv puas tau ua tsi ncaaj lossis tsimtxom mej leejtwg? Kuv puas tau yuav mej leejtwg tej nyaj xab? Yog kuv tau ua tej nuav lawm, kuv yuav them tej ntawd huv tuabsi rov qaab.”
Cov pejxeem teb has tas, “Koj yeej tsi tau ua tsi ncaaj lossis tsimtxom peb le, koj tsi tau muab leejtwg ib yaam dlaabtsi le.”

Ces Xamuyees teb has tas, “Nub nua muaj tug TSWV hab tug vaajntxwv kws nwg xaiv ua timkhawv has tas, mej yeej tsi pum kuv ua ib qho txhum le.” Puab teb has tas, “Muaj tug TSWV ua peb suavdlawg tug timkhawv.”
Xamuyees has ntxiv tas, “Tug TSWV yog tug kws xaiv Mauxes hab Aloos, hab nwg coj mej cov yawmkoob tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Nwgnuav mej nyag ca le sawv ntawm nyag qhov chaw, kuv yuav kom mej rua tug TSWV, kuas mej ncu txug  tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV tau ua paab mej hab mej cov yawmkoob lawm.

Thaus u Yakhauj tau coj nwg tsev tuabneeg moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab cov Iziv tau tsimtxom puab.  Mej cov yawmkoob tau tsaa ncauj thov tug TSWV paab puab. Tug TSWV txhaj khaiv Mauxes hab Aloos coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav.

Tabsis puab tsi ncu txug tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv lawm, tug TSWV txhaj muab puab cob rua cov Filitees txhais teg hab cob rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Mau-am txhais teg, hab cob rua Xixelas kws yog Vaajntxwv Yanpees tug thawj tubrog huv lub nroog Haxaus txhais teg, puab txhaj tuaj ua rog rua mej cov yawmkoob.

Puab txhaj tsaa ncauj thov tug TSWV has tas, ‘Tug TSWV, peb ua txhum lawm, rua qhov peb tau tso koj tseg, hab moog pe tug mlom Npa-aas hab tug mlom quaspuj Atates. Thov koj paab kuas peb dlim ntawm peb cov yeebncuab txhais teg, peb yuav pehawm koj tuab leeg xwb!’
Tug TSWV txhaj tsaa Nkide-oos, tsaa Npalaj,  tsaa Yefethas, hab tsaa kuv ua tug kawg. Peb tau paab mej dlim ntawm mej cov yeebncuab txhais teg, mej txhaj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.

Tabsis thaus mej pum Vaajntxwv Nahas kws kaav tebchaws Amoos taabtom tuaj tua mej, mej txawm tso tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajntxwv tseg hab has rua kuv tas, ‘Peb xaav tau ib tug vaajntxwv lug kaav peb.’
“Tug vaajntxwv kws mej xaiv, nwg nrug mej nyob ntawm nuav; mej thov tug TSWV kuas tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv rua mej, nwgnuav tug TSWV tub pub rua mej muaj lawm.
Yog mej fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, ua nwg teg num, noog nwg lug, hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug saamfwm, mej hab mej tug vaajntxwv txhaj le yuav vaammeej.
Tabsis yog mej tsi noog tug TSWV lug hab tsi ua lawv le nwg tej lug saamfwm, nwg yuav tawmtsaam mej hab mej tug vaajntxwv.
Yog le ntawd, mej suavdlawg nyag sawv ntawm nyag qhov chaw, mej yuav pum ib yaam txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV ua.

Nwgnuav yog lub caij ntuj qhua los tsi yog? Tabsis kuv yuav thov tug TSWV ua kuas xub nroo hab tso naag lug. Thaus mej pum tej nuav lawm, mej yuav paub has tas, qhov kws mej thov tug TSWV tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav mej, yog mej ua txhum rua tug TSWV lawm!”
Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txhaj thov tug TSWV, hab nub ntawd tug TSWV ua rua xub nroo hab tso naag lug. Suavdlawg ntshai tug TSWV hab Xamuyees kawg le.

Hab puab has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Thov koj thov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv paab peb, peb txhaj yuav tsi tuag. Nwgnuav peb paub has tas, tsi yog peb ua lwm yaam kev txhum xwb, tabsis peb tseem thov kuas Vaajtswv tsaa ib tug vaajntxwv kaav peb hab, qhov ntawd yeej yog peb ua txhum lawm tag.”
Xamuyees teb has tas, “Mej tsi xob ntshai, txawm yog mej tau ua txhum le ntawd lawm los mej tsi xob tso tug TSWV tseg, tabsis mej yuavtsum ua nwg teg num kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Tsi xob moog  pe tej vaajtswv cuav; tej ntawd yeej paab tsi tau lossis cawm tsi tau mej le, rua qhov tej ntawd yog vaajtswv cuav xwb.
Tug TSWV coglug tseg has tas, nwg yuav tsi tso mej tseg ib zag le, rua qhov nwg pum zoo xaiv mej ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawm.
Tug TSWV kuas kuv ncu ntsoov thov nwg tsi tseg paab mej. Yog kuv tsi thov nwg paab mej, ces yog kuv ua txhum rua nwg lawm. Kuv yuav qha kuas mej paub qhov zoo hab qhov kws tsimnyog mej ua.
Mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV lug hab ua nwg teg num kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws. Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV tau ua paab mej lawm.
Tabsis yog mej tseem rov ua txhum dlua, mej hab mej tug vaajntxwv yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.”
Thaus Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv nwg noobnyoog muaj… xyoo hab nwg kaav tebchaws Yixalayees tau ob xyoos

Xa-ules xaiv tau cov Yixalayees peb txheeb leej ua nwg cov tubrog, nwg tseg ob txheeb leej nrug nwg nyob huv lub nroog Mikemas hab sau lub laaj roob ntawm lub nroog Npethees, hab tso ib txheeb leej nrug nwg tug tub Yaunathaas moog rua nraag lub nroog Nkinpe-as, huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav. Dlua le cov, nwg kuas puab rov moog tsev lawm.

Yaunathaas tua cov Filitees tug thawj tubrog  tuag rua huv Nkenpas, hab cov Filitees puavleej nov has tas puab tug thawj tubrog tuag lawm. Xa-ules khaiv tuabneeg moog hu hab tshuab raaj tshuab xyu thoob tebchaws kuas cov Henplais tuaj moog ua rog.

Thaus cov Yixalayees nov has tas, Xa-ules tua cov Filitees tug thawj tubrog tuag, hab nov has tas cov Filitees ntxub cov Yixalayees heev, yog le ntawd, cov Yixalayees txhaj tuaj ua tubrog ntxiv rua Xa-ules cov tubrog huv lub nroog Nkilenkas.

Cov Filitees txhij tubrog tuaj tua cov Yixalayees; cov Filitees muaj peb caug txheeb lub tsheb neeg ua rog, rau txheeb leej tubrog caij neeg, hab muaj tubrog coob ib yaam le tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv. Puab tuaj tsuam yeej rua ntawm Mikemas kws nyob ntawm Npethavees saab nubtuaj.

Cov Filitees tua cov Yixalayees nyaav heev, ua rua cov Yixalayees yuav laug swb. Cov Yixalayees ibtxha tub tsiv moog nkaum rua huv tej qhov zeb qhov tsua, tej kis zeb kis tsua lossis huv tej qhov aav hab huv tej qhov tshij;
Muaj ibtxha tub tsiv hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua tim Nkile-as hab Khas cheebtsaam aav lawm. Xa-ules tseem nyob huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, hab cov tubrog kws nrug nwg ntshai tshee nyo.
Nwg tog Xamuyees tau xyaa nub, lawv le Xamuyees has rua nwg, tabsis Xamuyees tseem tuaj tsi tau txug huv lub nroog Nkilenkas. Suavdlawg txawm tsiv zum zawg tso Xa-ules tseg.

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le caab tej tsaj kws mej coj tuaj tua hlawv fij hab tej kws fij rua tug TSWV ua kev sis raug zoo lug rua kuv.” Ces Xa-ules txawm muab tsaj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV,
thaus Xa-ules muab tsaj tua hlawv fij taag, Xamuyees txawm tuaj txug ndlua, Xa-ules tawm moog cuag Xamuyees hab tog txais nwg,

tabsis Xamuyees nug has tas, “Koj ua dlaabtsi tod?” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Suavdlawg tsiv zum zawg tso kuv tseg, hab koj tsi tuaj lawv le koj teem tseg. Dlua le ntawd, cov Filitees tub tuaj sis sau rua huv lub nroog Mikemas lawm.

Kuv txhaj xaav has tas, ‘Cov Filitees yeej yuav tuaj tua kuv huv lub nroog Nkilenkas nuav, hab kuv tseem tsi tau ua ib yaam dlaabtsi kuas tug TSWV paab kuv.’ Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj xaav has tas ca kuv muab tsaj tua fij rua tug TSWV.”

Xamuyees teb has tas, “Koj ruag kawg le, koj txhaj ua tej nuav, koj yeej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv tej lug saamfwm rua koj. Yog koj noog tug TSWV lug, nwg yuav ca koj hab koj cov xeebntxwv ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees moog le.
Tabsis vim koj tsi noog tug TSWV lug, nwgnuav koj yuav tsi tau kaav cov Yixalayees lawm. Tug TSWV yuav tsaa dlua ib tug kws ua hum nwg sab lug kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”

Xamuyees txawm tawm huv lub nroog Nkilenkas moog lawm. Cov tuabneeg kws tseem nrug Xa-ules nyob txhaj nrug nwg moog rua ntawm nwg cov tubrog. Puab tawm huv lub nroog Nkilenkas  moog txug rua ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, Xa-ules txheeb nwg cov tubrog, tseem tshuav kwvlaam le rau pua leej.
Xa-ules hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaas, hab obtug cov tubrog tsuam yeej rua ntawm lub nroog Kenpas huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav; cov Filitees tsuam yeej rua ntawm lub nroog Mikemas.
Cov Filitees faib ua peb paab tawm huv puab lub yeej tuaj: ib paab moog rua ntawm Aufelas huv Sualis cheebtsaam aav,
ib paab moog rua ntawm Npethes Hauloos, hab ib paab moog rua ntawm nrimteb kws saib pum lub Haav Xenpauyees hab lub roob mojsaab qhua.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees tsi muaj ib tug txawj ntaus hlau le, rua qhov cov Filitees tsi pub cov Henplais ntaus ntaaj ntaus muv le.
(Cov Yixalayees txhaj coj puab tej khais, tej toomtxhob, tej taus hab tej lag  moog rua cov Filitees khu hab huv xwb;
huv ib raab taus hab tawm tug ku  yog ib lub nyaj, huv raab khais hab raab toomtxhob, yog ob lub nyaj.)
Yog le ntawd, thaus puab sis tua, cov tubrog Yixalayees txhaj tsi muaj ntaaj lossis muv le, tsuas yog Xa-ules hab nwg tug tub Yaunathaas txhaj le muaj xwb.
Cov tubrog Filitees ib paab tuaj zuv ntawm lub dlawm Mikemas.
Muaj ib nub Yaunathaas has rua tug tub hluas kws nqaa nwg raab ntaaj hab raab muv has tas, “Wb moog huv cov Filitees lub yeej.” Tabsis Yaunathaas tsi qha rua Xa-ules tug kws yog nwg txiv
kws tsaa tsevntaub nyob huv qaab tsob ntoo txiv ntsab pobkws ntawm lub nroog Minkeloos kws nyob tsi dleb ntawm lub nroog Nkinpe-as; Xa-ules cov tubrog muaj kwvlaam le rau pua leej.

(Tug povthawj kws naav lub tsho efaus yog Ahiyas kws yog Ahitus tug tijlaug Ikhanpaus tug tub, Ikhanpaus hab Ahitus yog Finehas tub hab yog Elis xeebntxwv. Elis yog tug povthawj kws ua Tug TSWV teg num nyob huv lub nroog Silaus.) Cov tubrog tsi paub has tas, Yaunathaas tub moog lawm.
Ntawm lub dlawm Mikemas kws Yaunathaas obtug hlaa moog rua ntawm cov Filitees lub yeej, muaj ob tug ncej zeb luj ntse zuag plag, ib tug nyob ib saab kev: ib tug hu ua Npauxes, hab ib tug hu ua Xenes.
Tug kws nyob saab peg, tig moog rua lub nroog Mikemas, hab tug kws nyob saab nraag, tig moog rua nraag lub nroog Nkenpas.

Yaunathaas has rua tug tub hluas has tas, “Wb ca le hlaa moog rua tom cov Filitees kws tsi ua kevcai txav lub yeej. Tej zag tug TSWV yuav paab wb; yog nwg paab wb, yeej tsi muaj dlaabtsi yuav txwv tau nwg kuas tsi pub wb yeej le. Txawm yog wb ob leeg xwb los wb yuav kovyeej.”
Tug hluas teb has tas, “Koj ua dlaabtsi  kuv nrug koj ua, koj moog qhov twg kuv nrug koj moog.”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Zoo heev, wb ca le moog kuas cov Filitees pum wb.
Yog puab hu kuas wb tog puab tuaj cuag wb tsaiv, los wb ca le nyob tuabywv tog.
Tabsis yog puab kuas wb moog cuag puab, wb ca le moog, rua qhov tej ntawd yuav yog lub cim qha rua wb paub has tas, tug TSWV tub muab puab cob rua wb teg lawm tag.”

Yog le ntawd, Yaunathaas hab tug tub hluas txawm tawm moog rua cov Filitees pum hab cov Filitees has tas, “Mej saib tim saib, cov Henplais muaj qee leej tawm huv tej qhov aav kws puab nkaum lug lawm!”

Cov Filitees txawm hu Yaunathaas hab tug tub hluas has tas, “Meb ca le lug ntawm nuav! peb yuav qha  dlaabtsi rua meb!” Yaunathaas has rua tug tub hluas has tas, “Koj ca le lawv kuv qaab, tug TSWV tub pub peb cov Yixalayees kovyeej puab lawm.”
Yaunathaas txawm nkaag ua ntej hab tug tub hluas nkaag lawv nwg qaab. Yaunathaas ntaus cov Filitees qaug rua huv aav, ces tug tub hluas ca le khaws tua xwb.
Thawj zag nuav Yaunathaas hab tug tub hluas tua cov Filitees tuag kwvlaam le neeg nkaum leej. Thaaj chaw kws puab sis ntaus sis tua lwj ntsuav ntawd dlaav le ob zeg laj.

Cov Filitees, tsi has cov kws nyob huv taj, cov tubrog kws nyob huv yeej, hab cov tubrog kws pheej nyag tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, puavleej ntshai kawg le. Aav txawm qeeg ua zug koog ua rua cov Filitees ntshai hab yoob taag.
Xa-ules cov tubrog kws zuv huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as huv xeem Npeenyamees cheebtsaam aav, pum cov Filitees tsiv zum zawg rua txhua qhov.

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules has rua nwg cov tubrog has tas, “Mej ca le txheeb peb cov tubrog saib leejtwg tsi nyob huv yeej lawm.” Thaus puab txheeb, puab tsi pum Yaunathaas hab tug tub hluas kws nqaa Yaunathaas raab ntaaj hab raab muv lawm.
Xa-ules has rua tug povthawj Ahiyas has tas, “Koj ca le nqaa lub efaus  lug ntawm nuav.” (Nub ntawd Ahiyas yog tug nqaa lub efaus ua cov Yixalayees ntej).

Thaus Xa-ules tseem has rua tug povthawj, cov tubrog Filitees kws nyob huv yeej yimfuab ua ntxhuv quas nab. Yog le ntawd Xa-ules txhaj has rua tug povthawj Ahiyas has tas, “Tsi muaj sijhawm nug tug TSWV lawm!”
Xa-ules hab nwg cov tubrog txhaj dlha moog tua cov Filitees kws puab taabtom rov sis ntaus sis tua ntxhuv quas nyo ntawd.
Cov Henplais qee leej kws tuaj cov Filitees tog hab nrug cov Filitees nyob huv lub yeej ntawd, puab txawm hloov sab  rov lug tuaj Xa-ules hab Yaunathaas tog tua cov Filitees.
Cov Henplais kws tsiv moog nkaum peg tej roob huv tebchaws Efalayees, nov has tas, cov Filitees taabtom swb hab tsiv zum zawg lawm, puab txawm sau nthwv tuaj paab Xa-ules tua cov Filitees
moog dlhau plawg lub nroog Npethavees. Nub ntawd tug TSWV paab cov Yixalayees dlim.

Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees tshaib plaab hab qaug zug heev, rua qhov Xa-ules coglug has tas, “Nub nua yog leejtwg noj mov ua ntej kws kuv ua pauj rua kuv cov yeebncuab, tug ntawd yuav raug foom tsi zoo.” Yog le ntawd, nub ntawd ib nub txhaj tsi muaj leejtwg noj mov le.
Taagnrho  cov tubrog lug txug rua huv ib thaaj haav zoov kws muaj zib ntaab ntau heev,
zib ntaab nyob puv nreeg txhua qhov, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg muaj cuabkaav muab noj le, rua qhov puab ntshai Xa-ules tej lug foom tsi zoo.

Tabsis Yaunathaas tsi nov qhov kws nwg txiv yuav foom tsi zoo rua tug kws tsi noog lug, nwg txhaj muab nwg tug paas nreg tshaum lub qa tsev ntaab lug noj. Thaus Yaunathaas noj taag, nwg txhaj muaj zug mivntsiv tuaj.

Tabsis muaj ib tug tubrog has rua Yaunathaas has tas, “Peb suavdlawg tshaib plaab hab qaug zug heev, tabsis koj txiv yuam kuas peb coglug has tas, ‘Tug kws noj mov nub nua, tug ntawd yuav raug foom tsi zoo.’ ”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Ua caag kuv txiv yuav ua nruj ua luaj rua peb cov tuabneeg! Mej saib kuv muaj zug mivntsiv tuaj, rua qhov kuv noj cov zib ntaab ntawd!
Yog nub nua cov tubrog tseem tau noj tej mov kws txeeb tau ntawm cov yeebncuab lug, mas suavdlawg hajyam yuav muaj zug tua cov Filitees tuag coob dlua hab.”
Nub ntawd cov Yixalayees tua yeej cov Filitees ntawm lub nroog Mikemas moog ti nkaus lub nroog Aiyaloos. Thaus ntawd cov Yixalayees tshaib plaab hab qaug zug heev.
Puab txhaj dlha moog muab tej yaaj hab tej nyuj kws puab txeeb tau ntawm cov yeebncuab lug tua hab muab hlais noj nyoog ua ntshaav lab vog.

Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj saib, muaj tuabneeg noj tej nqaj nyoog kws tseem muaj ntshaav. Puab ua le ntawd, yog puab ua txhum rua tug TSWV lawm!” Xa-ules nthe tawg ntho has tas, “Cov nyuas tuabneeg ntxeev sab ko, ca le moog dlov ib lub pobzeb luj lug rua kuv ntawm nuav!”

Tom qaab ntawd, Xa-ules has rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le moog has kuas puab caab puab tej nyuj hab tej yaaj tuaj tua noj rua ntawm nuav. Puab tsi xob noj tej nqaj nyoog kws muaj ntshaav, yuav ua txhum rua tug TSWV.” Yog le mo ntawd, puab txhaj caab puab tej nyuj lug tua qhov ntawd.
Xa-ules teeb tau ib lub thaaj fij khoom rua tug TSWV. Lub thaaj ntawd yog thawj lub kws Xa-ules teeb.

Xa-ules has rua nwg cov tubrog has tas, “Mo nuav peb yuav moog tua cov Filitees ib mos kaaj ntug kuas puab tuag taag hab fuab puab tej khoom huv tuabsi.” Cov tubrog teb has tas, “Ca le ua lawv le koj pum zoo.” Tabsis tug povthawj teb has tas, “Ca peb nug Vaajtswv tsaiv.”
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules nug tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav moog tua cov Filitees los tsi moog? Koj puas pub kuas peb tua yeej puab?” Tabsis nub ntawd Vaajtswv tsi teb le.
Xa-ules has rua cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj has tas, “Mej lug ntawm nuav, peb ua tuab zoo xaav saib, nub nua peb tau ua txhum dlaabtsi lawm.

Kuv coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob hab yog tug kws pub rua cov Yixalayees muaj yeej has tas, txawm yog kuv tug tub Yaunathaas ua txhum los yuavtsum muab nwg tua povtseg”, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg has ib lus le.
Ces Xa-ules has rua puab has tas, “Mej ca le moog sawv lawm tod, kuv hab Yaunathaas yuav sawv ntawm nuav.” Puab teb has tas, “Ua lawv le kws koj pum zoo.”

Xa-ules thov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv has tas, “Tug TSWV, ua caag nub nua koj tsi teb kuv?” Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, yog kuv tug tub Yaunathaas lossis kuv ua txhum, thov koj qha rua kuv ntawm lub Ulees, tabsis yog koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees  ua txhum, thov koj qha rua kuv ntawm lub Thumees.  Thaus nwg saib ua cav yog Yaunathaas hab Xa-ules ua txhum; tsi yog cov pejxeem ua txhum. l
Xa-ules has tas, “Tug TSWV, thov koj qha saib, yog kuv tug tub Yaunathaas lossis yog kuv ua txhum.” Thaus nwg saib ua cav yog Yaunathaas ua txhum.
Xa-ules nug Yaunathaas has tas, “Koj ua txhum dlaabtsi?” Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Kuv noj mivntsiv zib ntaab xwb. Kuv nyob ntawm nuav, kuv yeej zoo sab tuag.”
Xa-ules has tas, “Yog kuv tsi tua koj, thov kuas Vaajtswv tua kuv povtseg!”

Tabsis cov tuabneeg has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj yuav muab Yaunathaas tug kws paab tau cov Yixalayees kovyeej luj npaum le nuav tua povtseg los? Yog koj tua nwg peb yeej tsi zoo sab rua koj le! Peb thov coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob has tas, txawm yog Yaunathaas ib txuj nyuas plaubhau los tsi pub kuas poob le, tej kws nub nua nwg ua yeej yog Vaajtswv paab xwb.” Yog le ntawd, suavdlawg txhaj paab tau Yaunathaas dlim tsi raug tua tuag.
Ces Xa-ules txawm tso tseg tsi caum cov Filitees tua hab cov Filitees rov qaab moog rua puab lub tebchaws lawm.

Lub sijhawm kws Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees, nwg ntaus tsuv ntaus rog tawmtsaam nwg cov yeebncuab rua txhua qhov. Nwg tua cov Mau-am, cov Amoos hab cov Edoos, cov vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Xaunpas hab cov Filitees. Txhua qhov kws nwg tua, nwg puavleej tua yeej.
Nwg sab tawv hab tua rog ua tau heev tsi ntshai leejtwg le. Txawm yog cov Amalej los nwg tua yeej huv tuabsi. Txhua zag kws yeebncuab tuaj tua cov Yixalayees los nwg cawm tau puab dlim.
Xa-ules cov tub yog: Yaunathaas, Isevis hab Makhisesuas. Xa-ules tug ntxhais hlub hu ua Melas hab tug ntxhais yau hu ua Mikhas.
Xa-ules tug quaspuj hu ua Ahinaus kws yog Ahimas tug ntxhais; Xa-ules tug thawj tubrog hu ua Aneles kws yog Xa-ules tug yawm laug Neles tug tub.
Kises kws yog Xa-ules txiv hab Neles kws yog Aneles txiv, yog Anpiyees tub.
Thaus Xa-ules ua neej nyob, nwg nrug cov Filitees sis tua nyaav heev. Yog nwg pum ib tug txivneej kws khov kho hab sab tawv, ces nwg txawm coj tug ntawd moog ua nwg tubrog.

Xamuyees has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Kuv yog tug kws tug TSWV kuas muab roj laub rua koj taubhau, tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Nwgnuav koj ca le noog tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus tej lug saib has le caag.
Nwg yuav rau txim rua cov Amalej, rua qhov puab cov yawmkoob tawmtsaam cov Yixalayees thaus puab tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug,

Koj ca le moog tua cov Amalej hab rhuav txhua yaam kws puab muaj kuas puamtsuaj taag, tsi xob tseg ib yaam le. Koj lojxov tua tej quaspuj txivneej, tej mivnyuas hab tej nyuj, tej yaaj, tej ntxhuav hab tej neeg luav huv tuabsi povtseg.”
Xa-ules txhij taagnrho nwg cov tubrog tuaj sis sau rua huv lub nroog Telees rua nwg txheeb, cov tubrog Yixalayees muaj ob puas txheeb leej hab cov tubrog Yudas muaj kaum txheeb leej.
Xa-ules hab nwg cov tubrog txawm moog rua nraag cov Amalej lub nroog hab zuv kev tua huv lub haav qhuav.

Xa-ules xaa xuv moog rua cov Kenais kws puab cov yawmkoob tau ua zoo rua cov Yixalayees, thaus puab tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug has tas, “Mej ca le tsiv tawm tsi xob nrug cov Amalej nyob, mej txhaj yuav tsi raug tua tuag.” Yog le ntawd, cov Kenais txhaj tsiv lawm.
Xa-ules tua yeej cov Amalej txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Havilas moog ti nkaus rua Sus kws nyob ntawm tebchaws Iziv saab nubtuaj;
Xa-ules nteg tau cov Amalej tug Vaajntxwv Ankas, hab muab cov pejxeem tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Tabsis Xa-ules hab nwg cov tubrog tsi tua Ankas, hab tsi tua tej yaaj, tej nyuj hab tej mivnyuas nyuj, hab tej mivnyuas yaaj  kws zoo nkauj tshaaj plawg lossis tseg txhua yaam kws zoo ca; puab tsuas tua hab rhuav tej kws tsi zoo siv lossis tsi muaj nqes xwb.
Tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees has tas,
“Kuv tu sab kws kuv tsaa Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv, rua qhov nwg tso kuv tseg hab tsi noog kuv lug.” Xamuyees npautawg heev, nwg txhaj thov tug TSWV ib mos kaaj ntug.

Thaus kaaj ntug txoog, nwg txawm moog cuag Xa-ules, tabsis nwg nov has tas, Xa-ules tub moog rua peg lub nroog Kalemees lawm. Xa-ules moog puab ib tug pemthuam ua chaw ncu txug nwg, hab tom qaab ntawd, nwg moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas lawm.
Xamuyees moog cuag Xa-ules, Xa-ules has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua koj! Kuv tub moog ua lawv le tug TSWV has taag lawm.”
Xamuyees nug Xa-ules has tas, “Ua caag kuv tseem nov suab nyuj nqov hab suab yaaj quaj?”

Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv cov tubrog caab cov Amalej tej yaaj tej nyuj lug. Puab tseg tej yaaj tej nyuj kws zoo nkauj lug tua fij rua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv, dlua le cov kws tsi zoo, peb tub muab tua povtseg taag lawm.”
Xamuyees has tas, “Tog mivntsiv tsaiv, kuv yuav qha rua koj paub tej kws naag mo tug TSWV lug has rua kuv lawm.” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Qha rua kuv.”

Xamuyees teb has tas, “Txawm yog koj xaav has tas koj tsi tseemceeb dlaabtsi los koj yog cov Yixalayees tug thawjcoj. Tug TSWV tub muab roj laub rua koj taubhau hab tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees,
hab nwg kuas koj moog tua cov Amalej kws ua phem ua qas povtseg. Nwg kuas koj tua puab moog txug thaus puab tuag tu noob taag.
Vim le caag koj tsi noog tug TSWV lug? Vim le caag koj tseem moog fuab tej nuav, hab ua tej kws tsi hum tug TSWV sab le?”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv yeej noog tug TSWV lug, kuv tub ua lawv le nwg has lawm. Kuv nteg Vaajntxwv Ankas lug, hab muab cov Amalej tua tuag taag huv tuabsi lawm,

tabsis kuv cov tubrog tsi tau tua tej yaaj hab tej nyuj zoo nkauj kws puab nteg tau; puab txhaj caab tej tsaj ntawd lug rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas hab muab tua fij rua tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv.”

Xamuyees has tas, “Koj ua tuab zoo xaav saib, tug TSWV txaus sab rua yaam twg: Tug TSWV xaav kuas tuabneeg noog nwg lug lossis muab tsaj tua fij rua nwg? Noog tug TSWV lug zoo dlua qhov kws muab tej yaaj zoo nkauj tua fij rua nwg.

Tug tuabneeg kws ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV, ua txhum luj ib yaam le tug txawj tso dlaab, hab tug tuabneeg kws tawv ncauj, ua txhum luj ib yaam le tug kws pe mlom. Vim koj tsi noog tug TSWV lug, nwg txhaj tsi pub koj ua vaajntxwv lawm.”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum lawm tag, kuv tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm hab koj tej lug ntuag. Kuv ntshai kuv cov tubrog, kuv txhaj ua lawv le puab xaav yuav xaav tau.
Nwgnuav thov koj zaam txim rua kuv hab nrug kuv rov moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas, kuv txhaj yuav tau pehawm tug TSWV.”
Xamuyees teb has tas, “Kuv tsi nrug koj moog, koj tsi noog tug TSWV tej lug saamfwm, tug TSWV txhaj tsi pub koj ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv lawm.”
Xamuyees tig hlo yuav moog, Xa-ules txawm ntsab nkaus Xamuyees lub tw tsho nqug ndluag rhe.
Xamuyees has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Nub nua tug TSWV tub muab cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws tshem tawm ntawm koj moog rua tug kws ua zoo dlua koj kaav lawm.
Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab yeej tsi dlaag lossis tsi hloov sab le. Nwg tsi yog noobneej, nwg tsi hloov sab le.”

Xa-ules has tas, “Kuv yeej ua txhum lawm tag, tabsis thov koj ca kuv tau ntsejmuag taabmeeg kuv cov thawjcoj hab cov pejxeem Yixalayees. Thov koj nrug kuv rov moog, kuv txhaj tau pehawm tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv.”
Yog le ntawd, Xamuyees txhaj nrug Xa-ules rov moog rua huv lub nroog Nkilenkas hab Xa-ules moog pehawm tug TSWV.

Xamuyees has tas, “Mej ca le moog coj Vaajntxwv Ankas lug rua kuv ntawm nuav.” Ankas lug cuag Xamuyees, Ankas ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo hab xaav has tas, “Zag nuav kuv yuav raug txujkev tuag kws ab sab kawg nkaus!”

Xamuyees has tas, “Koj raab ntaaj ua rua ntau leej nam tej mivnyuas tuag taag, yog le ntawd, nwgnuav koj nam yuav tsi muaj tub ib yaam le luas hab!” Xamuyees txawm rhu hlo ntaaj lug txav Ankas ua tej thooj rua ntawm hauv ntej lub thaaj fij huv lub nroog Nkilenkas.
Ces Xamuyees txawm moog rua huv lub nroog Lamas, hab Vaajntxwv Xa-ules rov moog rua huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as lawm.
Xamuyees tsi pum Xa-ules moog txug nub kws Xamuyees tuag le; tabsis nwg tu sab rua Xa-ules kawg nkaus. Tug TSWV tu sab kws nwg tsaa Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees.

Tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Koj tseem yuav nyuaj sab rua Xa-ules moog txug thaus twg hab? Kuv tub tsi pub nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees lawm. Koj ca le nqaa ib fwj roj moog rua nraag lub nroog Npelehees, hab moog cuag ib tug txivneej kws hu ua Yexais, rua qhov kuv tub xaiv nwg cov tub ib tug ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees lawm.”

Xamuyees nug has tas, “Kuv yuav ua le caag moog ua tau le ntawd? Yog Xa-ules paub, ces nwg yeej yuav muab kuv tua xwb.” Tug TSWV has tas, “Koj ca le caab ib tug mivnyuas nyuj moog, hab has tas koj yuav coj moog tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.
Koj caw Yexais nrug koj moog tua tsaj hlawv fij, kuv maam le qha rua koj has tas, koj yuav ua le caag. Koj muab roj laub rua tug kws kuv qha rua koj ntawd taubhau hab tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv.”

Xamuyees ua lawv le tug TSWV has, nwg moog rua nraag lub nroog Npelehees, cov thawjcoj huv lub nroog ntshai ua ib ce tshee nyo tuaj nug Xamuyees has tas, “Tug kws pum yaav tom ntej, koj tuaj ntawm nuav yog tuaj zoo lossis tuaj phem?”

Xamuyees teb has tas, “Yog kuv coj tsaj tuaj tua hlawv fij rua tug TSWV xwb, mej ca le ua kevcai ntxuav hab tuaj cuag kuv.” Xamuyees has kuas Yexais hab nwg cov tub ua kevcai ntxuav ib yaam nkaus, hab kuas puab nrug nwg moog tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.
Thaus puab tuaj txug, Xamuyees pum Yexais tug tub Eli-as, nwg txawm xaav has tas, “Tug kws tuaj sawv taabmeeg tug TSWV nuav yog tug kws nwg xaiv ntaag.”

Tabsis tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Koj tsi xob saib qhov kws nwg sab hab zoo nraug xwb. Kuv tsi yuav tug ko, rua qhov kuv tsi saib tuabneeg le noobneej. Tuabneeg saib lub cev ntaaj ntsug, tabsis kuv saib tuabneeg lub sab.”
Yexais txawm hu nwg tug tub Anpinadas lug cuag Xamuyees. Tabsis Xamuyees has tas, “Tsi yog, tug TSWV tsi xaiv tug nuav hab.”
Yexais coj Samas lug. Xamuyees has tas, “Tsi yog, tug TSWV tsi xaiv tug nuav hab.”
Yexais coj nwg xyaa tug tub lug cuag Xamuyees. Xamuyees has rua Yexais has tas, “Tsi yog, tug TSWV tsi xaiv cov nuav ib tug le.”

Xamuyees nug Yexais has tas, “Koj cov tub muaj npaum le nuav leej xwb los?” Yexais teb has tas, “Tshuav tug tub ntxawg, tabsis nwg tseem moog yug yaaj lawm.” Xamuyees has tas, “Mej ca le moog hu nwg lug, peb tog nwg lug txug tsaiv, peb maam le tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV.”

Yog le ntawd, Yexais txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Daviv. Daviv zoo nraug ntxag, cev khov kho hab muaj sais muag zeeg. Tug TSWV has rua Xamuyees has tas, “Yog tug nuav ntaag, koj ca le muab roj laub rua nwg taubhau.”

Xamuyees txawm muab roj laub rua Daviv taubhau taabmeeg nwg cov tijlaug. Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug ntsujplig txawm kaav hlo Daviv lub sab hab nrug nwg nyob txij nub ntawd lug. Xamuyees txhaj rov lug rua huv lub nroog Lamas lawm.
Tug TSWV tug ntsujplig tsi nrug Xa-ules lawm, tabsis tug TSWV ca ib tug ntsujplig phem lug tsimtxom Xa-ules.
Xa-ules cov tubkhai has rua nwg has tas, “Peb paub has tas, Vaajtswv ca ib tug ntsujplig phem lug tsimtxom koj lawm.

Thov koj tso ncauj rua peb, peb yuav moog nrhav ib tug txivneej kws txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas lug nrug koj nyob, thaus twg tug ntsujplig phem ntawd lug tshoov koj sab, nwg yuav ntaus nkauj nogncaas rua koj noog kuas koj lub sab tug.”
Xa-ules has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le moog nrhav ib tug txivneej kws txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas zoo heev coj tuaj cuag kuv.”

Xa-ules cov tubkhai ib tug has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Yexais kws nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees muaj ib tug tub txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas heev, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg sab tawv hab zoo nraug ntxag. Nwg yog ib tug tubrog zoo, zoo ncauj zoo lug, hab tug TSWV nrug nraim nwg.”
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txawm tso tuabneeg moog has rua Yexais has tas, “Ca le tso koj tug tub Daviv kws yog ib tug tub yug yaaj tuaj nrug kuv nyob.”
Yexais coj Daviv moog cuag Xa-ules, caab ib tug neeg luav thauj ib nraas ncuav, ib naab tawv cawv txiv maab hab caab ib tug thaav tshis moog rua Xa-ules.
Daviv nrug Xa-ules nyob hab ua num rua nwg. Xa-ules nyam Daviv heev, hab tsaa Daviv ua tug nqaa nwg raab ntaaj hab raab muv.
Xa-ules has moog rua Yexais has tas, “Kuv nyam Daviv heev. Thov ca nwg nrug kuv nyob hab ua num rua kuv.”

Txij nub ntawd lug, thaus twg Vaajtswv ca tug ntsujplig phem ntawd lug tshoov Xa-ules sab, Daviv txawm muab nwg lub nkauj nogncaas lug ntaus. Ces tug ntsujplig phem ntawd txawm tawm ntawm Xa-ules moog, hab Xa-ules lub sab rov tug hab nyob le qub.
Cov Filitees txhij tubrog tuaj tua lub nroog Xukaus huv tebchaws Yudas; puab tuaj tsuam yeej rua ntawm qhov chaw kws hu ua Efes Damees, ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Xukaus hab Axekas.
Xa-ules hab cov tubrog Yixalayees moog tsuam yeej rua ntawm lub Haav Elas, puab npaaj tog yuav nrug cov Filitees sis tua.
Cov Filitees tuaj sawv sau ib lub laaj roob, cov Yixalayees los moog sawv sau ib lub laaj roob hab muaj ib lub haav quas.
Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Nkauli-am, nwg nyob huv lub nroog Nkas tuaj. Nwg tawm huv cov Filitees lub yeej tuaj twv cov Yixalayees. Nwg sab rau tshim,
nwg ntoo ib lub mom tooj hab naav ib lub tsho tooj nyaav ib puas neeg nkaum tsib choj,
hab muab tooj looj nwg ob txhais ceg huv tuabsi, nwg kwv rawv ib raab muv tooj sau xubpwg.
Nwg raab muv tuab ib yaam le lub nqog ntus ntaub, hab lub vug hlau nyaav kwvlaam le kaum tsib choj. Muaj ib tug tubrog nqaa Nkauli-am dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj moog ua Nkauli-am ntej.

Nkauli-am sawv nreg nroog hu nrov nrov rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm ko? Tuaj tua rog los? Xa-ules cov nyuas qhev, kuv yog tuabneeg Filitees, ca le xaiv mej cov tuabneeg ib tug tuaj tua kuv.
Yog nwg tua yeej kuv, peb yuav ua mej qhev; tabsis yog kuv tua yeej nwg, mej yuavtsum ua peb qhev.
Kuv sawv ntawm nuav twv ntxhas cov tubrog Yixalayees ntaag. Ca le xaiv mej cov ib tug tuaj tua kuv.”
Thaus Xa-ules hab nwg cov tubrog nov le ntawd, puab ntshai kawg le.
Daviv yog Yexais tug tub. Yexais yog xeem Efathas kws nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees, huv tebchaws Yudas, Yexais muaj yim leej tub, lub sijhawm kws Xa-ules ua vaajntxwv, Yexais laug heev lawm.
Nwg peb tug tub hlub nrug Xa-ules moog ua tubrog. Tug hlub hu ua Eli-as, tug ob hu ua Anpinadas hab tug peb hu ua Samas.
Daviv yog tug tub ntxawg, thaus Daviv peb tug tijlaug nrug Xa-ules moog ua rog ntawd,
Daviv pheej ib sij rov qaab moog paab nwg txiv yug tsaj huv lub nroog Npelehees.
Nkauli-am naj taagkig hab naj mo tuaj twv cov Yixalayees tau plaub caug nub.
Muaj ib nub Yexais has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj ca le xaa ib ntaa tawb mov kib hab kaum lub ncuav moog rua koj cov tijlaug kws nyob tom tshaav rog.

Koj coj kaum thooj mig nyuj qhuav nuav moog rua tug thawj tubrog. Moog nug saib koj peb tug tijlaug nyob le caag lawm. Koj kuas puab muab ib yaam dlaabtsi rua koj nqaa lug rua kuv saib, kuv txhaj paub has tas, koj moog pum puab tag, hab puab puavleej noj qaab nyob zoo.
Vaajntxwv Xa-ules, koj cov tijlaug hab cov tubrog Yixalayees puavleej nyob nraag lub Haav Elas tawmtsaam cov Filitees.”

Thaus kaaj ntug txoog Daviv txawm muab nwg paab yaaj tso rua lwm tug saib, ces nwg xaa mov moog rua nwg cov tijlaug lawv le nwg txiv has rua nwg. Daviv moog txug huv lub yeej tubrog, thaus cov Yixalayees taabtom tawm moog rua tom tshaav rog hab qw ntshu nrooj.
Cov Filitees hab cov Yixalayees nyag txhij nyag cov tubrog tuaj sawv ua phaj yav, hab saib ntsoov tog yuav sis tua.
Daviv muab tej zaub mov tso plhuav rua tug kws saib kev noj haus, Daviv dlha ceev nrooj moog cuag nwg cov tijlaug kws nyob tom tshaav rog, hab nug saib nwg cov tijlaug noj nyob le caag.
Thaus Daviv taabtom nrug nwg cov tijlaug thaam, Nkauli-am txawm tawm tuaj twv cov Yixalayees lawv le nwg naj nub ua. Hab Daviv kuj nov tej lug kws Nkauli-am khaav.
Thaus cov Yixalayees pum dlheev Nkauli-am, puab ntshai heev, puab nyag txawm tsiv nyag zum zawg moog lawm.

Puab sis thaam has tas, “Mej sim saib saib! Mej ca le noog tej lug kws nwg khaav! Vaajntxwv Xa-ules has tas, yog leejtwg moog tua tau nwg, vaajntxwv yuav muab nqe zug ntau hab muab nwg tug ntxhais rua tug ntawd yuav, hab nwg txiv tsev tuabneeg yuav tsi tau them se.”
