Daviv nug cov tuabneeg kws nyob ze ntawd has tas, “Tug kws tua tau tug tuabneeg Filitees ntawd hab paab tau cov Yixalayees tsi poob ntsejmuag yuav tau dlaabtsi nua? Tug tuabneeg Filitees kws tsi ua kevcai txav ntawd yog leejtwg, ua caag nwg yuav muaj cuabkaav khaav hab has lug saib tsi taug Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob cov tubrog?”
Puab qha rua Daviv has tas, tug kws tua tau Nkauli-am tuag yuav tau nqe zug dlaabtsi.

Eli-as kws yog Daviv tug tijlaug hlub, nov Daviv nrug cov tuabneeg sis thaam. Nwg npautawg rua Daviv hab tshev has tas, “Koj tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm nuav? Leejtwg zuv koj paab yaaj tom taj mojsaab qhua? Ua caag koj yuav tawv ua luaj? Kuv paub koj lub nyuas sab ko, koj xaav tuaj xauj luas sis tua xwb los mas!”
Daviv teb has tas, “Kuv ua txhum dlaabtsi? Kuv txawm nug tsi tau ib lus le los?”
Daviv txawm tig hlo moog nug dlua lwm tug tuab lu lug qub, hab txhua zag kws nwg nug, luas teb nwg tuab yaam nkaus.
Cov tuabneeg kws nov Daviv has, puab txawm moog pav qha rua Xa-ules. Xa-ules txhaj hu Daviv lug cuag nwg.
Daviv has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Vaajntxwv, tsi tsimnyog leejtwg yuav ntshai tug tuabneeg Filitees ntawd le! Kuv yuav moog nrug nwg sis tua ntaag.”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Tsi tau! Koj yuav ua le caag tua tau nwg? Koj tseem yog mivnyuas yau xwb, Nkauli-am yeej ibtxwm ua rog lug laug le ntawd.”
Daviv teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, kuv ibtxwm yug kuv txiv paab yaaj, thaus muaj tsuv ntxhuav lossis dlais lug tum ib tug mivnyuas yaaj kwv moog lawm,
kuv ca le lawv qaab moog ntaus hab cawm tau tug yaaj ntawd rov lug. Yog has tas, tsuv ntxhuav lossis dlais tig lug tum kuv, kuv ca le khawm nkaus cejdlaab qhau hab muab ntaus tuag kag.
Kuv tub tua tau tsuv ntxhuav hab dlais lawm. Kuv yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua tug tuabneeg Filitees kws tsi ua kevcai txav nuav, vim nwg txobthuam Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob cov tubrog.

Tug TSWV cawm kuv dlim ntawm tsuv ntxhuav hab dlais le caag, nwg yeej yuav cawm kuv dlim ntawm tug tuabneeg Filitees le ntawd hab.” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Tau lawm, koj ca le moog hab tug TSWV yuav nrug nraim koj.”
Xa-ules muab nwg cev rig tsho tooj rua Daviv naav hab muab nwg lub mom tooj rua Daviv ntoo,

Daviv muab Xa-ules raab ntaaj ris rua ntawm dluav hab sim moog kev, tabsis Daviv moog tsi taug kev le, rua qhov nwg naav tsi kaam tej ntawd. Daviv has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Yog kuv naav tej nuav, kuv moog sis tua tsi tau, rua qhov kuv tsi tau naav dlua tej nuav le.” Yog le ntawd, Daviv txawm muab hle tseg.

Daviv nqaa tug paas nreg kws nwg nreg zuv nwg paab yaaj, hab nwg khaws tau tsib lub pobzeb kheej kheej nraag ntug dlej ntim rua huv nwg lub naab. Nwg nqaa ib txuj zeg hlua, ces nwg txawm moog tua Nkauli-am.
Tug tuabneeg Filitees ncaaj nraim tuaj rua ntawm Daviv, tug kws nqaa Nkauli-am dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj ua ntej loo tuaj. Nkauli-am tuaj ze quas zug rua ntawm Daviv.
Thaus nwg pum Daviv tseeb lawm, nwg saib tsi taug Daviv, rua qhov Daviv tseem yog ib tug tub hluas kws zoo nraug ntxag xwb.
Nkauli-am has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj nqaa tug paas nreg ko tuaj ua dlaabtsi? Koj xaav has tas kuv yog dlev nua los?” Nwg txawm tuav nwg tug vaajtswv lub npe foom phem rua Daviv.
Nwg thuam Daviv has tas, “Tuaj ntawm nuav, kuv yuav muab koj lub cev rua tej noog hab tej tsaj noj.”

Daviv teb has tas, “Koj nqaa ntaaj nqaa muv hab xub vug tuaj tua kuv, tabsis kuv tuav tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus kws yog cov tubrog Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws koj saib tsi taug lub npe tuaj tua koj.

Nub nua tug TSWV yuav muab koj cob rua kuv teg. Kuv yuav tua tau koj hab txav koj lub taubhau povtseg. Kuv yuav muab cov tubrog Filitees lub cev rua tej noog hab tej tsaj noj. Kuas tuabneeg thoob nplajteb txhaj paub has tas, cov Yixalayees muaj Vaajtswv tag,
hab txhua tug kws nyob ntawm nuav yuav pum has tas, tug TSWV tsi siv ntaaj lossis muv cawm nwg tsaav tuabneeg, tug TSWV yuav tua yeej mej hab nwg yuav muab mej txhua tug cob rua peb teg.”
Nkauli-am txawm tuaj ze quas zug rua ntawm Daviv, hab Daviv kuj dlha ceev nrooj moog ti nkaus rua ntawm cov Filitees tug nrim tua Nkauli-am.
Daviv rhu hlo ib lub pobzeb huv naab lug tso rua ntawm txuj zeg hlua hab fav moog ntaub nkaus Nkauli-am hauvplaj tawg rhe, ua rua nwg qaug ntawg khwb nkaus rua huv aav.
Daviv tua Nkauli-am tuag, tsi yog muab ntaaj tua, tabsis yog muab txuj zeg hlua hab ib lub pobzeb xwb.

Daviv dlha loo moog sawv sau Nkauli-am, hab rhu hlo Nkauli-am raab ntaaj huv naab lug tua Nkauli-am tuag hab txav kag Nkauli-am cejdlaab tu nrho. Thaus cov Filitees pum has tas, puab tug tubrog kws ua tau heev tuag lawm, ces puab txawm tig loo tsiv.

Cov tubrog Yixalayees hab cov tubrog Yudas txhaj qw ntshu nrooj caum cov Filitees tua moog ti nkaus lub nroog Nkas hab moog ti nkaus lub nroog Ekiloos tej roojvaag. Cov Filitees raug mob pw pawg lug taug txujkev kws moog rua huv lub nroog Sala-ees moog ti nkaus lub nroog Nkas  hab lub nroog Ekiloos.
Thaus cov Yixalayees kws caum tua cov Filitees rov lug, puab tshawb cov tubrog Filitees tej khoom txhua yaam huv yeej nqaa lug.
Daviv nqaa Nkauli-am lub taubhau lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, tabsis Daviv nqaa Nkauli-am tej cuabyeej ua rog moog tso rua huv Daviv lub tsevntaub.
Thaus Xa-ules pum Daviv moog tua Nkauli-am lawm, xa-ules nug Aneles kws yog nwg tug thawj tubrog has tas, “Aneles, tug hluas ntawd yog leejtwg tug tub?” Aneles teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, kuv tsi paub.”
Xa-ules has tas, “Koj ca le moog nug saib.”
Yog le ntawd, thaus Daviv moog tua tau Nkauli-am hab nwg rov lug txug huv lub yeej, Aneles txawm coj Daviv moog cuag Xa-ules. Daviv tseem nqaa rawv Nkauli-am lub taubhau.
Xa-ules nug Daviv has tas, “Tug hluas, koj yog leejtwg tub?” Daviv teb has tas, “Kuv yog koj tug tubkhai Yexais kws nyob huv lub nroog Npelehees tug tub.”
Thaus Xa-ules nrug Daviv thaam taag, Xa-ules tug tub Yaunathaas txaus sab rua Daviv hab hlub Daviv ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg lub cev.
Txij nub ntawd lug Xa-ules txawm kuas Daviv nrug nwg nyob hab tsi pub Daviv rov moog tsev le lawm.
Yaunathaas coglug rua Daviv ua phoojywg ruaj khov moog taag simneej, rua qhov nwg hlub Daviv ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg lub cev.
Yaunathaas hle nwg lub tsho ntev rua Daviv, muab nwg lub tsho tooj, raab ntaaj, raab neevnti hab txuj hlaab tawv rua Daviv.
Xa-ules khaiv kuas Daviv ua dlaabtsi los Daviv ua tau tav taag huv tuabsi. Xa-ules txhaj tsaa Daviv ua nwg ib tug thawj tubrog. Xa-ules cov thawj tubrog hab cov tubrog puavleej pum zoo.

Tom qaab kws Daviv moog tua tau Nkauli-am hab cov tubrog Yixalayees taabtom rov lug tsev, cov quaspuj huv tej nroog huv tebchaws Yixalayees tuaj tog Vaajntxwv Xa-ules. Puab seev cev hu nkauj zoo sab, npuaj nruag hab ntaus nkauj nogncaas.
Thaus cov quaspuj seev cev, puab hu nkauj has tas, “Xa-ules tua tuag quas txheeb leej, tabsis Daviv tua tuag quas vaam leej.”

Xa-ules nov tej lug ntawd, nwg tsi txaus sab hab chim heev. Nwg txhaj has tas, “Puab hu nkauj qhuas Daviv has tas, ‘Daviv tua tuag quas vaam leej, tabsis kuv tua tuag quas txheeb leej xwb. Nwgnuav tsuas yog tshuav qhov kws puab tsi tau tsaa Daviv ua vaajntxwv xwb!’ ”
Txij nub ntawd lug, Xa-ules txawm khib hab dlub muag rua Daviv le lawm.

Nub tom qaab Vaajtswv ca tug ntsujplig phem lug tshoov Xa-ules sab, Xa-ules txawm has lug ua dlog ua dlig huv nwg tsev le tug tuabneeg vwm. Daviv txawm lug ntaus nkauj nogncaas rua Xa-ules noog lawv le nwg naj zag ntaus, Xa-ules tuav rawv ib raab muv ntawm teg.
Xa-ules xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav muab muv nkaug nwg kuas teem nkaus rua tim phaab ntsaa.” Xa-ules txhaj muab muv nkaug Daviv ob zag; tabsis Daviv mam dlhau huv tuabsi lawm.
Xa-ules ntshai Daviv heev, rua qhov tug TSWV nrug nraim Daviv, tabsis tug TSWV tso Xa-ules tseg lawm.
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj tsi pub Daviv nrug nwg nyob, hab tsaa Daviv ua ib tug thawj tubrog saib pawg txheeb, Daviv coj nwg cov tubrog moog tua rog
hab Daviv ua txhua yaam tav huv tuabsi, rua qhov tug TSWV nrug nraim nwg.
Thaus Xa-ules pum Daviv ua tau txhua yaam tav, Xa-ules yimfuab ntshai Daviv heev.
Tabsis cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas nyam Daviv heev, rua qhov Daviv yog ib tug thawjcoj kws ua tau txhua yaam tav.

Tom qaab nuav, Xa-ules has rua Daviv has tas, “Tug nuav yog kuv tug ntxhais hlub Melas. Kuv muab rua koj yuav ua quaspuj, tabsis koj yuavtsum ua kuv ib tug tubrog kws sab tawv hab muab sab npuab kuv, hab ntaus tsuv ntaus rog tawmtsaam tug TSWV cov yeebncuab.” (Xa-ules xaav has tas yog ua le nuav cov Filitees yuav tua tau Daviv, tsi yog nwg tua.)
Daviv teb has tas, “Kuv yog leejtwg, kuv txiv tsev tuabneeg yog leejtwg kws txhaj tsimnyog ua vaajntxwv vauv?”
Tabsis thaus txug nub kws yuav muab Melas txis rua Daviv, Xa-ules txawm hloov sab hab muab Melas txis rua Aliyees kws nyob huv lub nroog Mehaulas yuav lawm.
Tabsis Xa-ules tug ntxhais Mikhas nyam Daviv heev, thaus Xa-ules paub le ntawd, Xa-ules zoo sab kawg le.

Xa-ules xaav has tas, “Kuv yuav muab Mikhas rua Daviv yuav; txhaj yuav ntxag tau Daviv moog tuag rua cov Filitees teg.” Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj rov has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj yuav tau ua kuv tug vauv.”
Xa-ules kuas nwg cov numtswv moog has tuabywv rua Daviv has tas, “Vaajntxwv nyam koj, hab nwg cov numtswv los puavleej fwm koj; nwgnuav yog sijhawm zoo kws koj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv tug vauv.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj moog has rua Daviv, hab Daviv teb has tas, “Tug kws tau ua vaajntxwv vauv, tug ntawd tau ntsejmuag heev, tug tuabneeg pluag hab tsi tseemceeb le kuv nuav tsi tsimnyog ua vaajntxwv vauv.”
Cov numtswv pav Daviv tej lug rua Xa-ules,

Xa-ules txhaj kuas puab rov moog has rua Daviv has tas, “Tug nqe tshoob kws vaajntxwv xaav kuas koj them, tsuas yog cov Filitees ib puas dlaim tawv noov xwb, nwg txhaj pauj tau nwg cov yeebncuab.” (Qhov kws Xa-ules ua le nuav, yog nwg xaav ntxag Daviv moog kuas cov Filitees tua tau Daviv.)
Xa-ules cov numtswv moog has rua Daviv lawv le Xa-ules has rua puab, hab Daviv zoo sab kws yuav tau ua vaajntxwv vauv. Thaus yuav txug nub ua tshoob,

Daviv hab nwg cov tubrog moog tua cov Filitees tuag ob puas leej. Daviv txhaj hlais cov Filitees ib puas dlaim tawv noov coj lug suav ib dlaig zuj zug rua vaajntxwv saib, kuas Daviv tau ua Xa-ules vauv. Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj muab Mikhas rua Daviv yuav.
Xa-ules paub has tas tug TSWV nrug Daviv, hab nwg tug ntxhais Mikhas los nyam Daviv heev.
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules yimfuab ntshai Daviv, hab nwg ua yeebncuab rua Daviv moog taag nwg simneej.
Txhua zag kws cov Filitees tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, Daviv yog tug tua yeej ntau tshaaj Xa-ules cov thawj tubrog. Ces Daviv lub koob meej txhaj nrov nchaa moo lug.
Xa-ules qha qhov kws nwg yuav tua  Daviv rua nwg tug tub Yaunathaas hab nwg cov numtswv. Tabsis Yaunathaas hlub Daviv heev,
Yaunathaas txhaj moog qha rua Daviv has tas, “Kuv txiv nrhav kev yuav muab koj tua povtseg. Pigkig sawv ntxuv koj yuavtsum ceevfaaj; hab koj tsiv moog nkaum tsi xob tawm moog qhov twg le.
Kuv yuav moog sawv ntawm kuv txiv ib saab ntawm qhov chaw kws koj nkaum nraag laj. Kuv yuav nug kuv txiv txug koj, yog kuv paub le caag, kuv maam le qha rua koj.”

Yaunathaas qhuas Daviv rua Xa-ules noog has tas, “Txiv, koj tsi xob ua phem rua Daviv kws yog koj tug tubkhai, nwg tsi tau ua txhum rua koj dlaabtsi le; tej kws nwg tau ua lawm, puavleej yog tej kws muaj nqes rua koj xwb.

Nwg phaav sav moog tua Nkauli-am, hab tug TSWV pub cov Yixalayees muaj yeej luj kawg le. Thaus koj pum tej nuav, koj tub zoo sab heev. Nwg tsi tau ua txhum dlaabtsi, vim le caag koj pheej xaav muab nwg tua povtseg? Tsi muaj qaabhau kws koj yuav muab nwg tua povtseg.”
Xa-ules noog Yaunathaas has, hab Xa-ules coglug rua tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi tua Daviv povtseg.”
Yog le ntawd, Yaunathaas txhaj hu Daviv tawm lug. Nwg pav txhua yaam rua Daviv noog hab coj Daviv moog cuag Xa-ules. Daviv txhaj rov moog ua num rua vaajntxwv le qub.
Tom qaab nuav, cov Filitees rov tuaj ua rog rua cov Yixalayees dlua, Daviv txhaj coj tubrog moog tua cov Filitees swb hab tsiv rov moog taag lawm.
Muaj ib nub tug TSWV ca tug ntsujplig phem rov lug tshoov Xa-ules sab dlua. Xa-ules nyob huv tsev, nwg tuav rawv nwg raab muv, hab Daviv taabtom ntaus nkauj nogncaas rua Xa-ules noog.
Xa-ules txawm muab muv nkaug Daviv kuas teem nkaus rua tim phaab ntsaa, tabsis Daviv mam dlhau, hab raab muv ntsa nkaus rua tim phaab ntsaa. Daviv tawm plawg tsiv lawm,

Mo ntawd, Xa-ules tso tuabneeg moog soj Daviv huv Daviv tsev, hab taagkig kaaj ntug yuav muab Daviv tua povtseg. Mikhas kws yog Daviv tug quaspuj has rua Daviv has tas, “Yog mo nuav koj tsi tsiv, pigkig kaaj ntug luas yuav muab koj tua povtseg.”
Yog le ntawd, Mikhas muab hlua khi Daviv tso dlauv ntawm qhovrais rua saab nrau hab Daviv tsiv moog lawm.
Mikhas muab tug mlom tso pw sau txaaj, muab lub tog rau ncoo plaub tshis lug rau tug mlom ncoo, hab muab choj lug vuv rua.
Thaus Xa-ules cov tubrog tuaj nteg Daviv, Mikhas has rua puab tas, “Daviv mob lawm.”
Tabsis Xa-ules kuas puab rov moog saib Daviv. Nwg has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le kwv nwg hab nwg lub txaaj tuaj rua kuv, kuv yuav muab nwg tua povtseg.”
Puab txhaj moog huv tsev hab pum tug mlom zuv tsev pw sau txaaj, hab lub tog rau ncoo plaub tshis tag rawv tug mlom taubhau.

Xa-ules nug Mikhas has tas, “Ua caag koj txhaj dlaag kuv le nuav hab tso kuv tug yeebncuab dlim lawm?” Mikhas teb has tas, “Nwg has rua kuv tas, yog kuv tsi paab kuas nwg dlim, nwg yuav muab kuv tua povtseg.”

Daviv tsiv moog cuag Xamuyees peg lub nroog Lamas hab Daviv pav txhua yaam kws Xa-ules ua phem rua nwg huv tuabsi rua Xamuyees noog. Ces Daviv hab Xamuyees txawm moog nyob rua huv lub zog Nayaus lawm.
Muaj tuabneeg moog qha rua Xa-ules has tas, Daviv nyob huv lub zog Nayaus huv lub nroog Lamas,

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj khaiv tuabneeg moog nteg Daviv. Puab tuaj pum  Xamuyees coj ib paab cev Vaajtswv lug taabtom seev cev hab cev Vaajtswv lug. Ces Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig txawm lug kaav hlo Xa-ules cov tuabneeg sab, puab txawm ca le nrug cov cevlug ntawd seev cev hab cev Vaajtswv lug.

Thaus Xa-ules nov le ntawd, nwg tso ib paab tuabneeg coob dlua qub moog los puab ca le moog seev cev hab cev Vaajtswv lug ib yaam le paab ntawd lawm. Xa-ules tso dlua paab peb moog los puab ca le moog ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd hab.

Xa-ules txhaj moog rua peg lub nroog Lamas. Thaus nwg moog txug ntawm lub qhov tshij luj huv Xekus, Xa-ules nug has tas, “Xamuyees hab Daviv nyob qhov twg?” Puab qha has tas, “Obtug nyob huv lub zog Nayaus.”
Thaus Xa-ules taabtom moog rua huv, Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig txawm lug kaav hlo Xa-ules sab, nwg txhaj seev cev hab cev Vaajtswv lug taug kev moog txug ndlua huv lub zog Nayaus.

Xa-ules muab nwg cev rig tsho hle, seev cev hab cev Vaajtswv lug taabmeeg Xamuyees, hab pw labqaab ib nub ib mos. (Vim qhov nuav, txhaj muaj lug has tas, “Xa-ules yog ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug lawm hab los?”)

Tom qaab ntawd, Daviv txawm tsiv tawm ntawm lub zog Nayaus huv lub nroog Lamas moog cuag Yaunathaas. Nwg nug Yaunathaas has tas, “Kuv tau ua dlaabtsi? Kuv muaj txim dlaabtsi? Kuv tau ua txhum koj txiv qhov twg, nwg txhaj pheej xaav muab kuv tua povtseg?”

Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Vaajtswv yuav tsi pub kuas koj tuag. Txhua zag kws kuv txiv yuav ua dlaabtsi, nwg yeej qha rua kuv ua ntej, tsi has yaam kws tseemceeb lossis tsi tseemceeb, nwg tsi npog ib yaam tseg le. Nyaj yuav tsi muaj le koj xaav!”

Tabsis Daviv teb has tas,  “Koj txiv paub has tas koj hlub kuv heev, tej kws koj txiv yuav ua, nwg tsi qha rua koj, nyob tsaam koj yuav ntxhuv sab heev. Kuv tuav tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob lub npe qha rua koj has tas, kuv nyob tsi dleb ntawm txujkev tuag lawm!”
Yaunathaas has tas, “Koj xaav kuas kuv paab koj dlaabtsi, kuv yeej txaus sab paab.”

Daviv teb has tas, “Pigkig yog nub ua rooj noj rooj haus Hli Xab, kuv yuav tau nrug vaajntxwv noj mov ua ke. Tabsis thov ca kuv tsiv moog nkaum nraag laj, moog txug quasneeg yuav tsaus ntuj, kuv maam le rov lug.

Yog koj txiv tsi pum kuv lug nyob ntawm rooj mov, ces koj has rua nwg tas, kuv tub thov koj ca kuv rov moog rua nraag lub nroog Npelehees lawm, rua qhov kuv txiv puab yuav tua tsaj hlawv fij rua tug TSWV lawv le naj xyoo ua.
Yog koj txiv has tas, ‘Tau lawm,’ Ces kuv txhaj le yuav tso sab; tabsis yog nwg npautawg, ces koj paub has tas nwg yeej yuav muab kuv tua povtseg.
Thov koj ua le kuv has nuav, hab ncu ntsoov tej lug kws koj cog tseg rua kuv lawm. Yog kuv ua txhum, koj ca le muab kuv tua povtseg xwb! Ua le caag koj yuav coj kuv moog rua koj txiv tua?”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Koj tsi xob xaav le ko, yog kuv paub has tas, kuv txiv yuav muab koj tua povtseg tag, kuv puas khuv muab npog ca tsi qha rua koj paub?”
Daviv nug has tas, “Yog koj txiv teb koj ua npautawg vog, leejtwg yuav tuaj qha rua kuv paub.”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Wb moog nraag laj.” Ces obtug txawm moog,

hab Yaunathaas has rua Daviv has tas, “Thov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv ua timkhawv rua wb!  Pigkig hab quasneeg lub caij nuav kuv yuav nug kuv txiv saib, yog nwg ua zoo rua koj, kuv yuav qha rua koj paub.
Yog nwg yuav ua phem rua koj, kuv tseem tsi qha rua koj paub hab paab kuas koj dlim, ces thov tug TSWV muab kuv tua povtseg. Thov tug TSWV nrug nraim koj ib yaam le yaav taag lug nwg nrug kuv txiv!
Yog kuv tseem ua neej nyob, thov koj ncu ntsoov koj tej lug cog tseg hab ua zoo rua kuv. Tabsis yog kuv tuag lawm
los thov koj ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua kuv tsev tuabneeg moog ib yaam le koj ua rua kuv. Thaus tug TSWV ua rua koj tej yeebncuab puamtsuaj taag lawm
los thov kuas wb tej lug cog tseg nuav tseem nyob ruaj khov kho. Yog koj rhuav wb tej lug cog tseg nuav, tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua koj.”
Yaunathaas kuas Daviv rov coglug tseg ib zag ntxiv has tas, nwg yuav hlub Yaunathaas, rua qhov Yaunathaas hlub Daviv ib yaam le nwg hlub nwg lub cev.
Yaunathaas has rua Daviv has tas, “Pigkig yog nub ua rooj noj rooj haus Hli Xab, yog tsi pum koj moog, kuv txiv yeej yuav nug xwb.
Yog quasneeg tseem tsi tau pum koj tshwm hab, ntshai kuv txiv yimfuab yuav nug heev;  yog le ntawd, koj ca le tsiv moog nkaum ntawm qhov qub chaw, hab koj moog nkaum ntawm pawg pobzeb saab tom,
Ces kuv yuav muab neevnti tua peb nee moog rua ntawm pawg pobzeb ib yaam le kuv tua dlaim phaj.

Kuv yuav kuas kuv tug tubkhai moog khaws cov xub lug. Yog kuv qha rua nwg has tas, ‘Cov xub poob rua ntawm koj saab tom nuav, koj ca le moog khaws lug.’ Qhov ntawd txhais has tas, koj ca le tawm lug, tsi muaj xwm dlaabtsi. Kuv coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob has tas, koj yuav tsi raug kev txhawj ntshai dlaabtsi.
Tabsis yog kuv qha rua kuv tug tubkhai has tas, ‘Cov xub poob rua ntawm koj saab tom u lawm.’ Ces koj ca le tsiv, rua qhov tug TSWV tub pum zoo ca koj moog lawm.
Tej lug kws wb cog tseg nuav muaj tug TSWV ua timkhawv has tas, wb ib tug yuav tsi rhuav ib tug tej lug moog ibtxhis le.”
Nub kws ua rooj noj rooj haus Hli Xab ntawd, Daviv txawm moog nkaum rua nraag laj lawm. Vaajntxwv Xa-ules tuaj rua ntawm rooj noj rooj haus,

hab nyob ntawm lub chaw kws nwg ibtxwm nyob npuas ntawm phaab ntsaa. Aneles nyob npuas nkaus vaajntxwv, hab Yaunathaas nyob ncaaj vaajntxwv xubndlag saab rooj tod,  Daviv lub chaw tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob le.
Tabsis nub ntawd Xa-ules tsi has ib lus le, rua qhov nwg xaav has tas, “Tej zag yog muaj dlaabtsi ua rua Daviv lub cev tsi huv lawm, nwg txhaj tsi tuaj.”
Nub tom qaab los tsi pum Daviv tuaj nyob nwg lub chaw le, Xa-ules txhaj nug Yaunathaas has tas, “Ua caag naag mo hab nub nua tsi pum Daviv tuaj noj mov?”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Nwg thov kuv kuas ca nwg rov moog rua nraag Npelehees lawm.

Nwg has tas, ‘Thov ca kuv moog, rua qhov peb tsev tuabneeg tua tsaj fij ua rooj noj rooj haus huv lub nroog Npelehees, hab kuv tug tijlaug kuas kuv yuavtsum moog xwb, yog koj yog kuv tug phoojywg tag, thov koj tso kuv moog saib kuv cov kwvtij,’ vim le ntawd nwg txhaj tsi tuaj nyob ntawm nwg lub chaw noj mov.”
Xa-ules chim heev rua Yaunathaas hab tshev Yaunathaas has tas, “Nam tub tsi tsimtxaj nuav, nwgnuav kuv paub has tas, koj nrug Daviv ua ib nqaag, koj rhuav koj hab koj nam ntsejmuag nkaus xwb!
Koj puas paub has tas, yog Daviv tseem ua neej nyob, koj yuav tsi tau ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws nuav le? Koj ca le moog coj Daviv lug ntawm nuav, kuv yuav muab nwg tua povtseg.”
Yaunathaas teb has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj yuav muab nwg tua povtseg, nwg tau ua txhum koj dlaabtsi?”
Thaus Yaunathaas has le ntawd, Xa-ules tsaa hlo muv nkaug Yaunathaas. Yaunathaas txhaj paub has tas, nwg txiv yeej xaav muab Daviv tua povtseg tag.

Yaunathaas txawm sawv tseeg ntawm rooj mov tawm npautawg vog moog lawm, hab nub ntawd nwg tsi noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le, nub ntawd yog nub xab ob. Yaunathaas ntxhuv sab kawg le, rua qhov nwg txiv ua phem heev rua Daviv.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv, Yaunathaas txawm moog cuag Daviv nraag laj, lawv le obtug tau teem tseg lawm. Nwg coj ib tug tub hluas nrug nwg moog
hab has rua tug tub hluas ntawd tas, “Koj dlha moog khaws cov xub kws kuv yuav tua moog.” Thaus tug tub hluas taabtom dlha moog, Yaunathaas txawm nqug neevnti tua cov xub moog ua ntej.
Thaus tug tub hluas moog txug ntawm qhov chaw kws cov xub poob, Yaunathaas hu has tas, “Cov xub poob rua tom u lawm!
Koj tsi xob nreg ntawm ko, koj ca le dlha tag moog!” Tug tub hluas ntawd khaws cov xub coj lug rua Yaunathaas.
Nwg tsi paub has tas sov Yaunathaas has le ntawd, yog nwg has dlaabtsi, tsuas yog Yaunathaas hab Daviv txhaj paub xwb.
Yaunathaas muab nwg raab neevnti rua tug tub hluas hab kuas nwg nqaa moog tsev.
Thaus tug tub hluas rov moog tsev lawm, Daviv maam tawm ntawm pawg pobzeb  saab tod lug, nwg lug txhus caug pe Yaunathaas peb zag, obtug sis qawg quaj hab sis nwj; Daviv mluag tshaaj Yaunathaas.

Yaunathaas has rua Daviv has tas, “Thov Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj. Thov tug TSWV ua timkhawv rua wb hab wb cov xeebntxwv has tas, wb hab puab yuav tsi rhuav tej lug kws wb cog tseg nuav moog ibtxhis le.” Ces Daviv txawm ncaim moog, hab Yaunathaas rov lug rua huv nroog lawm.
Daviv moog cuag tug povthawj Ahimelej kws nyob huv lub nroog Naus. Ahimelej tawm tshee nyo tuaj ntsib Daviv hab nug has tas, “Ua caag koj tuab leeg tuaj xwb, tsi muaj leejtwg nrug koj tuaj le?”

Daviv teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv kuas kuv tuaj ua ib qhov num, hab nwg kuas kuv tsi xob qha tej kws nwg khaiv kuv tuaj ua nuav rua leejtwg paub le. Kuv tub teem kuv cov tuabneeg rua ib qhov chaw kuas puab tuaj ntsib kuv lawm.
Koj puas muaj dlaabtsi noj? Thov muab tsib lub ncuav rua kuv lossis koj muab dlaabtsi los tau.”
Tug povthawj teb has tas, “Kuv tsi muaj tej ncuav kws noj tau le, tsuas muaj cov ncuav kws muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm xwb; yog koj cov tuabneeg tsi tau nrug quaspuj pw, mas kuv txhaj muab rua koj.”

Daviv teb has tas, “Qhov tseeb, puab yeej tsi nrug quaspuj pw le. Thaus kuv cov tuabneeg tawm moog ua num lawm, peb yeej caiv kuas peb yog tuabneeg huv; nub nua peb tuaj ua num, mas peb hajyam caiv zoo.”

Yog le ntawd, tug povthawj txhaj muab cov ncuav kws tub muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm rua Daviv, rua qhov nwg tsuas muaj cov ncuav kws tub muab fij rua Vaajtswv, hab tshem tawm sau lub rooj kws yuav muab cov ncuav tshab hloov lawm xwb.
(Nub ntawd Dau-es kws yog Xa-ules tug thawj tubkhai yug tsaj kws yog tuabneeg Edoos, tuaj nyob ntawd hab, rua qhov nwg tuaj cuag tug TSWV.)

Daviv nug Ahimelej has tas, “Koj puas muaj ib raab muv lossis ib raab ntaaj rua kuv? Kuv tsi coj muv lossis ntaaj tuaj le, rua qhov vaajntxwv khaiv kuas kuv ca le tuaj taamsim, kuv txhaj nqaa tsi tau tuaj.”

Ahimelej teb has tas, “Kuv muaj Nkauli-am kws yog tuabneeg Filitees tug kws koj tua tuag huv lub Haav Elas raab ntaaj kws muab ntaub qhwv tso rua tom qaab lub efaus. Yog koj xaav tau raab ntawd los coj raab ntawd moog, rua qhov tsi muaj dlua lwm raab lawm.” Daviv teb has tas, “Tsi muaj dlua lwm raab ntaaj zoo tshaaj raab ntawd lawm, thov muab raab ntawd rua kuv.”
Yog le nub ntawd, Daviv txawm tsiv Xa-ules moog cuag Vaajntxwv Akhises kws kaav lub nroog Nkas lawm.

Vaajntxwv Akhises cov numtswv has rua Vaajntxwv Akhises has tas, “Tug nuav puas yog Daviv kws ua vaajntxwv kaav nwg lub tebchaws? Tug txivneej nuav yog tug kws cov quaspuj hu nkauj hab seev cev qhuas has tas, ‘Xa-ules tua tuag quas txheeb leej, tabsis Daviv tua tuag quas vaam leej!’ ”
Daviv khaws tej lug ntawd rua nruab sab, hab ntshai Vaajntxwv Akhises kws kaav lub nroog Nkas kawg le.
Daviv ua txuj ua le tug tuabneeg vwm, thaus luas cheem nwg, nwg laam tau laam kes ntawm tej roojvaag nroog,  hab ua quavncaug nrug quas zig ntawm nwg tej fwjtxwv.
Yog le ntawd, Akhises has rua nwg cov tubkhai has tas, “Mej saib, nwg vwm lawm! Ua caag mej tseem coj nwg tuaj cuag kuv hab?
Kuv tsi muaj tuabneeg vwm los caag? Ua caag mej tseem coj dlua ib tug tuabneeg vwm le nuav tuaj huv kuv tsev hab taabkaum kuv?”

Daviv tsiv huv lub nroog Nkas moog rua huv ib lub qhov tsua kws nyob ze ntawm lub nroog Adulas. Thaus nwg cov tijlaug hab nwg tsev tuabneeg nov has tas nwg nyob qhov ntawd, puab txawm tuaj nrug nwg nyob.
Cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tsimtxom, cov kws tshuav luas nqe, hab cov kws tsi txaus sab puavleej tuaj cuag nwg, taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ntawd muaj plaub puas leej hab Daviv ua puab tug thawj.

Daviv tawm qhov ntawd moog rua huv lub nroog Mixepas nraag tebchaws Mau-am hab nwg has rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Mau-am has tas, “Thov ca kuv nam kuv txiv lug nyob huv koj lub tebchaws moog txug nub kws kuv paub has tas Vaajtswv yuav ua dlaabtsi rua kuv tsaiv.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj tso nwg nam nwg txiv rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Mau-am. Hab obtug nrug vaajntxwv nyob moog txug nub kws Daviv tawm huv qhov tsua lug.

Nkas kws yog tug cev Vaajtswv lug, tuaj cuag Daviv hab has tas, “Koj tsi xob nyob ntawm nuav lawm; taamsim nuav koj ca le tawm rov moog rua peg tebchaws Yudas.” Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj tawm hab moog rua huv thaaj Haav Zoov Heles lawm.

Thaus Xa-ules nyob huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as, muaj ib nub nwg moog nyob huv qaab tsob ntoo tamalis sau ib lub ncov roob, nwg tuav rawv nwg raab muv ntawm teg hab taagnrho nwg cov numtswv sawv puagncig nwg. Txawm muaj tuabneeg lug qha rua Xa-ules has tas, puab pum Daviv hab Daviv cov tuabneeg.

Xa-ules txawm has rua nwg cov numtswv has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Npeenyamees, mej ca le noog kuv has! Mej xaav has tas Daviv yuav faib tej laj teb hab tej vaaj txiv maab rua mej hab tsaa mej ua nwg cov thawj tubrog nua los?

Tub yog vim le ntawd, mej txhaj ntxeev sab rua kuv los! Mej cov ko tsi muaj ib tug qha rua kuv paub has tas, kuv tug tub moog koom nrug Daviv lawm. Mej cov ko tsi muaj ib tug txhawj txug kuv lossis qha rua kuv has tas, Daviv kws yog kuv ib tug tubrog, nrhav kev tua kuv, hab kuv tug tub los tseem cuab nwg zug kawg le.”
Dau-es kws yog tug thawj saib Xa-ules cov tubkhai kws yog tuabneeg Edoos teb has tas, “Kuv pum Daviv thaus nwg moog cuag Ahitus tug tub Ahimelej huv lub nroog Naus.
Ahimelej nug tug TSWV saib Daviv yuav ua le caag, nwg tseem ntim zaub mov hab muab Nkauli-am kws yog tuabneeg Filitees raab ntaaj rua Daviv lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Vaajntxwv Xa-ules txhaj tso tuabneeg moog hu tug povthawj Ahimelej hab nwg cov kwvtij kws ua povthawj huv lub nroog Naus, puab txhaj tuaj cuag Xa-ules.
Xa-ules has rua Ahimelej has tas, “Ahimelej, koj ca le noog kuv has!” Ahimelej teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, kuv nyob ntawm nuav!”

Xa-ules nug Ahimelej has tas, “Vim le caag koj hab Daviv tuavhuv ntxeev sab rua kuv? Vim le caag koj muab zaub mov, muab ntaaj hab nug Vaajtswv rua nwg? Nwgnuav nwg tig tawmtsaam kuv hab nrhav kev yuav muab kuv tua!”
Ahimelej teb has tas, “Daviv yog koj ib tug thawj tubrog kws sab ncaaj tshaaj le! Nwg yog koj tug vauv, hab yog tug thawj tubrog kws  nrug nraim koj, hab txhua tug huv koj lub loog fwm nwg heev.

Yog tag, kuv yeej tau nug Vaajtswv rua nwg, tabsis zag nuav tsi yog thawj zag.  Vaajntxwv, qhov kws koj has tas, kuv tuavhuv nrug Daviv ntxeev sab rua koj ntawd, koj tsi xob lam rua kuv lossis kuv tsev tuabneeg ib tug twg. Kuv yeej tsi paub txug tej xwm nuav le!”
Vaajntxwv has tas, “Ahimelej, koj hab koj cov kwvtij yeej yuav raug tua tuag taag le!”

Ces Xa-ules has rua cov tubrog kws sawv ze ntawd nwg has tas, “Ca le tua tug TSWV cov povthawj nuav! Puab tau koom sab nrug Daviv, hab tsi qha rua kuv paub has tas, Daviv tsiv lawm, txawm yog puab tub paub los puab tseem tsi qha.” Tabsis cov tubrog tsi kaam tua tug TSWV cov povthawj le.

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj has rua Dau-es has tas, “Koj ca le muab cov povthawj ntawd tua!” Dau-es txhaj muab cov povthawj tua tuag taag. Nub ntawd, nwg tua cov povthawj kws naav lub efaus tuag yim caum tsib leeg.

Xa-ules tseem muab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Naus kws yog cov povthawj lub nroog tua tuag taag, tsi has quaspuj txivneej, tej mivyuas tug hlub tug yau, tej nyuj, tej neeg luav hab tej yaaj huv tuabsi.
Tabsis Ahimelej cov tub ib tug kws hu ua Anpiyathas tsiv dlim hab moog koom nrug Daviv lawm.
Anpiyathas moog qha txhua yaam kws Xa-ules tua tug TSWV cov povthawj rua Daviv paub.
Daviv has rua Anpiyathas has tas, “Nub kws kuv pum Dau-es, kuv yeej paub lawm has tas, nwg yuav moog qha rua Xa-ules. Yog vim kuv  koj txiv tsev tuabneeg txhaj raug tua tuag taag.
Koj nrug kuv nyob hab tsi xob ntshai. Xa-ules yeej xaav muab koj hab kuv tua povtseg, tabsis koj ca le tso sab hab nrug kuv nyob ntawm nuav.”
Daviv nov has tas, cov Filitees tuaj tua lub nroog Kelas hab fuab cov pejxeem tej nplej tshab coj moog taag.
Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj nug tug TSWV has tas, “Puas tsimnyog kuv moog tua cov Filitees?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Koj ca le moog tua cov Filitees hab cawm lub nroog Kelas.”
Tabsis Daviv cov tuabneeg has rua Daviv has tas, “Peb nyob huv tebchaws Yudas nuav, peb tub ntshai txaus lawm, yog peb moog tua cov Filitees huv lub nroog Kelas, peb hajyam yuav ntshai heev.”
Daviv txhaj rov nug tug TSWV dlua, hab tug TSWV has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj ca le moog tua lub nroog Kelas, kuv yuav pub kuas koj tua yeej cov Filitees.”

Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj moog rua huv lub nroog Kelas hab tua cov Filitees tuag coob heev, hab txeeb tau puab tej tsaj txhu huv tuabsi. Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj cawm tau lub nroog Kelas.
Thaus Ahimelej tug tub Anpiyathas tsiv moog cuag Daviv huv lub nroog Kelas ntawd, nwg coj tau ib lub efaus moog hab.

Muaj tuabneeg qha rua Xa-ules has tas, Daviv moog rua huv lub nroog Kelas lawm, Xa-ules txawm has tas, “Vaajtswv tub muab Daviv cob rua kuv teg lawm. Daviv tau kev twg, rua qhov nwg moog rua huv lub nroog kws muaj ntsaa yeej hab muaj cov roojvaag thaiv lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txawm txhij nwg cov tubrog moog tua lub nroog Kelas, puav Daviv hab nteg nwg cov tuabneeg.
Thaus Daviv nov has tas, Xa-ules npaaj yuav tuaj tua nwg, nwg has rua tug povthawj Anpiyathas has tas, “Coj lub efaus lug ntawm nuav!”

Daviv has tas, “Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, kuv nov has tas, Xa-ules npaaj yuav tuaj rua huv lub nroog Kelas nuav, hab rhuav kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj taag vim kuv kws yog koj tug tubkhai.

“Cov pejxeem huv lub nroog Kelas nuav puas yuav muab kuv cob rua Xa-ules teg? Xa-ules puas yuav tuaj lawv le kuv nov ntawd tag? Tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv, thov koj teb kuv.” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Xa-ules yeej yuav tuaj xwb!”
Daviv rov nug dlua has tas, “Cov pejxeem huv lub nroog Kelas nuav puas yuav muab kuv hab kuv cov tuabneeg cob rua Xa-ules teg?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Puab yuav ua le ntawd ntaag.”

Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg rau pua leej txhaj tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Kelas taamsim ntawd lawm. Thaus Xa-ules nov has tas, Daviv tsiv tawm huv lub nroog Kelas moog lawm, Xa-ules txawm tsi ua lawv le nwg tau npaaj sab tseg.
Daviv tsiv moog nkaum sau lub laaj roob mojsaab qhua kws ze lub taj mojsaab qhua Xifes. Xa-ules naj nub nrhav Daviv, tabsis Vaajtswv tsi muab Daviv cob rua Xa-ules teg.
Daviv pum Xa-ules tuaj nrhav Daviv Tua. Thaus Daviv tseem nyob ntawm Haules kws ze lub taj mojsaab qhua Xifes.
Yaunathaas tuaj cuag Daviv qhov ntawd hab txhawb Daviv zug has tas Vaajtswv yuav tsomkwm Daviv,

hab has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai. Kuv txiv Xa-ules yeej tsi muaj cuabkaav ua tau le caag rua koj. Nwg paub has tas, koj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees hab kuv yuav tau ua tug yau ntawm koj.”
Obtug coglug ua phoojywg taabmeeg tug TSWV; Daviv tseem nyob huv Haules, tabsis Yaunathaas rov qaab moog tsev lawm.

Cov tuabneeg huv Xifes qee leej moog qha rua Xa-ules huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as has tas, “Daviv tsiv moog nkaum huv Haules kws nyob sau lub roob Hakhilas, huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb kws ua suabpuam lawm.
Vaajntxwv, yog koj xaav nteg nwg, koj ca le tuaj rua huv peb lub tebchaws hab peb yuav muab nwg cob rua koj teg.”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej qhov kws mej ua zoo rua kuv.
Mej rov qaab moog saib ib zag ntxiv kuas paub tseeb has tas, nwg nyob qhov twg tag, hab leejtwg yog tug pum nwg. Kuv nov has tas nwg ntse heev.

Mej moog nrhav saib nwg nkaum qhov twg tag, hab maaj ceev nrooj rov tuaj qha rua kuv paub. Yog nwg tseem nyob qhov ntawd, kuv yuav nrug mej moog nrhav kuas tau nwg tua, txawm yog nrhav thoob tebchaws Yudas los kuv yuav moog.”

Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj ua Xa-ules ntej moog rua huv Xifes lawm. Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg nyob sau lub laaj roob mojsaab qhua Ma-oos ntawm lub haav qhuav huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb kws ua suabpuam.

Xa-ules hab nwg cov tuabneeg txawm moog nrhav Daviv, tabsis Daviv nov le ntawd, nwg txhaj moog rua sau lub roob zeb kws nyob ntawm roob mojsaab qhua Ma-oos hab nyob sau. Thaus Xa-ules nov le ntawd, nwg txawm caum Daviv qaab moog.
Xa-ules hab nwg cov tuabneeg nyob ib saab roob, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg nyob ib saab roob. Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg npaaj tsiv kuas dlim Xa-ules hab nwg cov tuabneeg kws tuaj ze yuav nteg puab.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, txawm muaj ib tug txivneej tuaj has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab taamsim nuav, cov Filitees tub tuaj vij peb lub tebchaws taag lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txhaj tseg tsi caum Daviv hab tig rov moog tua cov Filitees lawm. Vim le ntawd, txhaj muab qhov chaw ntawd hu ua lub Laaj Roob Sis Quas.
Daviv txawm tawm qhov ntawd hab moog nkaum rua huv cheebtsaam Enkedis lawm.
Thaus Xa-ules moog tua cov Filitees rov qaab lug, muaj tuabneeg qha rua nwg has tas, Daviv nyob tom roob mojsaab qhua kws ze ntawm Enkedis.
Xa-ules txawm xaiv cov tubrog Yixalayees kws txawj tua rog peb txheeb leej moog nrhav Daviv hab Daviv cov tuabneeg ntawm lub roob tsuas sai saab nubtuaj.

Xa-ules tuaj txug ntawm lub qhov tsua kws nyob ze cov nkuaj yaaj ntawm ntug kev, nwg txawm moog tawm rooj huv lub qhov tsua ntawd. Lub qhov tsua ntawd tub yog lub kws Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg nkaum huv ntaag.

Daviv cov tuabneeg has rua Daviv has tas, “Zag nuav yog sijhawm zoo rua koj lawm, lawv le tug TSWV has rua koj tas, nwg yuav muab koj tug yeebncuab cob rua koj teg, koj xaav ua le caag rua nwg los tau!” Daviv txawm nyaag moog txav Xa-ules lub tw tsho ntev ib qho nqaa moog lawm los Xa-ules tub tsi nov le.
Tom qaab ntawd, Daviv nyuaj sab heev, rua qhov kws nwg txav Xa-ules lub tw tsho,

Daviv has rua nwg cov tuabneeg has tas, “Thov tug TSWV tsi xob pub kuv ua tej yaam tsi zoo rua kuv tug vaajntxwv kws tug TSWV xaiv. Tsi tsimnyog kuv ua ib qho phem rua nwg le, rua qhov yog tug TSWV tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj tsi pub nwg cov tuabneeg muab Xa-ules tua povtseg. Xa-ules txawm sawv tseeg tawm huv qhov tsua moog lawm.
Daviv lawv lag qaab moog hu Xa-ules has tas, “Vaajntxwv!” Xa-ules tig hlo saib tuaj, Daviv txhus caug ndlua nyo ntshis ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav hawm
hab has tas, “Ua caag koj noog luas tej lug kws has tas, kuv soj nraim yuav tua koj?

Kuv qha rua koj paub has tas, nub nua tug TSWV tub muab koj cob rua kuv huv lub qhov tsua nuav lawm. Kuv cov tuabneeg kuas kuv muab koj tua povtseg, tabsis vim kuv fwm koj, kuv txhaj tsi ua phem rua koj, rua qhov koj yog tug kws tug TSWV tsaa ua vaajntxwv.

Txiv, koj saib, kuv tub txav tau koj lub tw tsho nyob ntawm kuv teg nuav! Yog kuv xaav tua koj, ces kuv tub tua tau koj lawm, tabsis kuv tsuas txav koj lub tw tsho xwb. Qhov nuav qha rua koj paub has tas, kuv tsi tau ntxeev sab lossis ua phem rua koj le. Txawm yog kuv tsi tau ua txhum rua koj los koj pheej caum kuv tua.
Thov tug TSWV txav txim rua wb saib leejtwg yog tug ua txhum! Thov tug TSWV rau txim rua koj, vim koj ua phem rua kuv, rua qhov kuv tsi tau ua phem rua koj le.
Nyaj koj yeej paub tej lug kws cov laug ibtxwm has tas, ‘Tsuas yog tug tuabneeg sab phem txhaj ua phem xwb.’ Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav tsi ua phem rua koj.
Cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv, koj moog tawmtsaam leejtwg? Koj moog caum leejtwg? Koj caum tug dlev kws tuag lawm los? Koj caum dlev mub los?
Thov tug TSWV tshuaj saib yog koj lossis yog kuv ua txhum. Thov tug TSWV tsaa muag saib zaaj nuav, hab tuaj kuv tog paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm koj txhais teg.”
Thaus kws Daviv has le ntawd taag, Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv tug tub, koj yog Daviv ntaag los?” Ces Xa-ules txawm quaj.
Xa-ules has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj has yog lawm! Kuv tau ua txhum tag. Txawm yog kuv tau ua phem rua koj los koj tseem ua zoo rua kuv.
Nub nua koj ua rua suavdlawg pum has tas, koj ua zoo kawg nkaus rua kuv. Txawm yog tug TSWV muab kuv cob rua koj teg lawm los koj tseem tsi tua kuv povtseg.
Puas muaj leejtwg nteg tau nwg tug yeebncuab, hab ca le muab tso moog tsi muab tua povtseg? Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua koj, pauj tej kws koj tau ua zoo rua kuv nub nua.
Nwgnuav kuv paub has tas, koj yuav tau ua cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv hab kaav lub tebchaws kuas vaammeej moog lawm yaav tom ntej.
Thov koj tuav tug TSWV lub npe coglug rua kuv has tas, koj yuav tsi tua kuv cov xeebntxwv povtseg, kuas kuv lub npe hab kuv tsev tuabneeg lub npe txhaj yuav tsi pluj moog.”
Daviv coglug has tas, nwg yuav ua le ntawd. Xa-ules txawm rov qaab moog tsev, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj rov lug rua ntawm qhov chaw kws puab nkaum lawm.
Xamuyees tuag, cov Yixalayees tuaj paam nwg hab muab nwg log rua huv nwg lub tsev huv lub nroog Lamas. Tom qaab ntawd, Daviv txawm moog rua nraag taj mojsaab qhua Palaas.

Muaj ib tug txivneej hu ua Nanpaas, nwg yog Kalej cuab kwvtij kws nyob huv lub nroog Ma-oos, hab nwg muaj ib thaaj teb nyob ze ntawm lub nroog Kalemees. Nwg yog tuabneeg npluanuj, nwg muaj peb txheeb tug yaaj, hab ib txheeb tug tshis. Anpinkayis kws yog Nanpaas tug quaspuj ntse hab zoo nkauj heev, tabsis Nanpaas yog ib tug tuabneeg tsiv ncauj tsiv lug heev. Nanpaas taabtom txav plaub yaaj huv lub nroog Kalemees,
Daviv nyob nraag taj mojsaab qhua, nwg nov has tas Nanpaas taabtom txav plaub yaaj,
Yog le ntawd, Daviv txhaj khaiv kaum leej tub hluas moog rua huv lub nroog Kalemees, kuas moog nrhav Nanpaas hab has lug noj qaab nyob zoo rua nwg.

Daviv kuas puab moog has rua Nanpaas has tas, “Kuv tug phoojywg, thov kuas koj ntsib kev kaaj sab lug! Thov kuas koj hab koj tsev tuabneeg tau txais kev noj qaab nyob zoo, hab txhua yaam kws koj ua kuas vaammeej!

Kuv nov has tas, koj taabtom txav plaub yaaj. Kuv qha rua koj has tas, thaus koj cov tub yug yaaj tuaj nrug peb nyob, peb tsi tau ua phem le caag rua puab. Thaus puab nyob huv lub nroog Kalemees los tsi muaj leejtwg nyag puab ib yaam dlaabtsi le.

Koj ca le nug koj cov tuabneeg, puab yeej yuav qha rua koj paub. Kuv thov koj ua zoo rua kuv cov tuabneeg, rua qhov peb tuaj rua nub kws suavdlawg taabtom ua rooj noj haus. Thov koj muab tej yaam kws koj yuav muab tau rua peb cov kws yog koj tubkhai hab Daviv kws yog koj tug phoojywg zoo.”
Thaus Daviv cov tuabneeg coj Daviv cov lug tuaj has rua Nanpaas taag, puab txawm nyob tog,
Nanpaas teb has tas, “Daviv yog leejtwg? Yexais tug tub yog leejtwg? Kuv tsi paub nwg. Ntu nuav cov tubkhai coob leej tau tsiv tawm ntawm puab tug tswv moog lawm.
Puas tsimnyog kuv muab kuv tej ncuav, tej dlej hab tej nqaj kws kuv npaaj rua kuv cov tuabneeg txav plaub yaaj noj pub rua cov tuabneeg kws kuv tsi paub has tas yog leejtwg hab nyob qhov twg tuaj?”
Daviv cov tuabneeg txawm rov lug hab pav txhua yaam kws Nanpaas has ntawd rua Daviv noog.

Daviv txawm has rua nwg cov tuabneeg has tas, “Mej txhua tug ca le muab ntaaj lug ris ntawm dluav.” Puab txhua tug txawm ua le Daviv has. Daviv los kuj muab ntaaj lug ris rua ntawm dluav hab. Nwg coj kwvlaam le plaub puas leej nrug nwg moog, tseg ob puas leej nyob zuv puab tej khoom xwb.

Nanpaas cov tubkhai ib tug moog qha rua Anpinkayis kws yog Nanpaas tug quaspuj has tas, “Daviv tso tuabneeg nraag taj mojsaab qhua tuaj cuag Nanpaas kws yog peb tug tswv, tabsis nwg has lug saib tsi taug puab le.
Puab cov ntawd ibtxwm nrug peb sis raug zoo; puab yeej tsi tau ua phem rua peb, hab thaus peb nrug puab nyob tom tshaav yug tsaj los peb tej khoom yeej tsi pluj ib yaam le.
Puab tiv thaiv peb taag nub taag mo, lub sijhawm kws peb saib peb tej tsaj ntawd.
Koj sim xaav saib yuav ua le caag; rua qhov tej nuav yuav ua kev puamtsuaj rua peb tug tswv hab nwg tsev tuabneeg. Peb tug tswv yog ib tug tuabneeg kws tsi zoo has lug, nwg tsi noog leejtwg has le.”

Anpinkayis txawm ua kawgkag tau ob puas lub ncuav, Ntim tau ob naab cawv txiv maab, muab tsib tug yaaj tua ci, muab ob thoob ntsab kib, ib puas pob txiv maab qhuav hab ob puas lub txiv ncuav pas qhuav nog rua neeg luav thauj.
Anpinkayis has rua cov tubkhai has tas, “Mej ca le ua ntej moog, kuv yuav lawv mej qaab tuaj.” Tabsis nwg tsi qha rua nwg tug quasyawg le.
Thaus Anpinkayis taabtom caij neeg luav moog lawv zaaj ntaav zaag kws puag lub laaj roob, nwg txawm ntsib Daviv hab Daviv cov tuabneeg tuaj txug ntawd.

Daviv taabtom xaav has tas, “Kuv tub paab tiv thaiv tej kws yog tug tuabneeg nuav tug tom taj mojsaab qhua, nwg txhaj tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi pluj le, ua caag nwg tseem tsi ncu kuv txaj ntsig le? Nwg txawm muab kev phem pauj kuv txujkev ua zoo xwb!
Yog kuv tseem tseg cov tuabneeg ntawd ib tug ca txug pigkig kaaj ntug, thov tug TSWV tua kuv  povtseg.”
Thaus Anpinkayis pum dlheev Daviv, nwg txawm nqeg kag sau tug neeg luav lug txhus caug ndlua pe Daviv ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav
rua ntawm Daviv kutaw thov has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, thov koj noog kuv has, hab thov ca kuv tuab leeg ris qhov kev txhum ntawd xwb!

Tug tswv, thov koj tsi xob quavntsej Nanpaas kws yog tug tuabneeg tsi zoo has lug ntawd. Nwg lub npe Nanpaas txhais has tas, ruag!  Mas nwg yeej ruag le ntawd tag; tabsis tug tswv, thaus koj khaiv koj cov tubkhai tuaj, kuv tsi nyob ntawd.

Tug TSWV tub tsi pub koj ua pauj hab tua koj cov yeebncuab, kuv txhaj tuav tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob lub npe coglug rua koj has tas, koj cov yeebncuab hab txhua tug kws xaav ua phem rua koj, yuav raug txim ib yaam le Nanpaas.
Tug tswv, thov koj txais tej kws kuv coj tuaj rua koj hab muab rua koj cov tuabneeg.

Tug tswv, thov zaam txim rua tej kws kuv tau ua txhum lawm! Tug TSWV yuav tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv, hab koj cov xeebntxwv los yuav tau ua vaajntxwv. Qhov kws koj ua rog, yog koj ua tug TSWV teg num. Thaus koj tseem ua neej nyob nuav, koj yuav tsi ua ib qho phem le.

Txawm yog muaj tuabneeg pheej caum koj tua povtseg los tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv yuav tsomkwm koj ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws zuv nwg cov nyaj. Tabsis tug TSWV yuav muab koj cov yeebncuab laim povtseg ib yaam le luas muab lub pobzeb tso rua ntawm txuj zeg hlua laim ntaag.
Thaus tug TSWV ua txhua yaam zoo rua koj lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua koj hab tsaa koj ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees lawm,

mas kuv tug tswv yuav tsi ntxhuv sab, rua qhov koj tsi tau ua phem pauj phem lossis tsi tau ua rua luas nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug. Thaus tug TSWV ua zoo rua koj kws yog kuv tug tswv lawm, thov koj ncu txug kuv hab.”
Daviv has rua Anpinkayis has tas, “Ua tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tsaug kws nub nua nwg khaiv koj tuaj ntsib kuv.
Ua Vaajtswv tsaug kws koj yog ib tug txawj xaav, hab tej kws koj cheem kuas nub nua kuv tsi xob ua phem pauj phem hab tua tuabneeg.

Tug TSWV tsi pub kuv ua phem rua koj. Kuv tub tuav cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob lub npe coglug lawm, yog nub nua koj tsi tuaj ntsib kuv, ces pigkig kaaj ntug Nanpaas tsev tuabneeg yuav tsi muaj ib tug seem le!”
Daviv txais tej kws Anpinkayis coj tuaj rua nwg ntawd hab has rua Anpinkayis has tas, “Koj ca le rov moog tsev hab tsi xob txhawj, kuv yuav ua lawv le koj tej lug thov.”

Thaus Anpinkayis rov lug rua ntawm Nanpaas, Nanpaas taabtom noj ib rooj mov luj huv tsev cuag le npaaj rua vaajntxwv noj. Nanpaas taabtom qaug cawv hab zoo sab heev, yog le ntawd, Anpinkayis txhaj tsi qha ib yaam dlaabtsi rua nwg moog txug thaus taagkig kaaj ntug.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv thaus Nanpaas zoo cawv lawm, Anpinkayis txawm pav txhua yaam qha rua Nanpaas noog, ces Nanpaas tej hlaab ntshaav sau taubhau txhaws ua rua nwg lub cev tuag taag.
Tau kwvlaam le kaum nub tom qaab, tug TSWV muab Nanpaas tua tuag lawm.

Thaus Daviv nov has tas Nanpaas tuag lawm, nwg has tas, “Ua tug TSWV tsaug kws nwg tau ua pauj qhov kws Nanpaas ua saib tsi taug kuv hab qhov kws tug TSWV tsi pub kuv kws yog nwg tug tubkhai ua phem. Tug TSWV rau txim rua Nanpaas vim tej kev phem kws nwg ua.” Ces Daviv txawm tso tuabneeg moog coj Anpinkayis lug ua Daviv quaspuj.
Thaus Daviv cov tubkhai moog txug ntawm Anpinkayis tsev huv lub nroog Kalemees, puab has rua Anpinkayis has tas, “Daviv kuas peb tuaj coj koj moog ua nwg quaspuj.”
Anpinkayis txhus caug ndlua pe ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav hab has tas, “Kuv yog nwg tug qhev, kuv yuav ntxuav nwg cov tubkhai tej kutaw.”
Anpinkayis txawm sawv tseeg moog caij nwg tug neeg luav nrug Daviv cov tubkhai moog ua Daviv quaspuj, hab coj nwg tsib tug ntxhais qhev nrug nwg moog.
Daviv tub yuav Ahinau-as huv lub nroog Yexelees ua quaspuj lawm, nwgnuav Daviv maam yuav Anpinkayis hab.
Thaus ntawd, Xa-ules muab nwg tug ntxhais Mikhas kws yog Daviv quaspuj rua Laises tug tub Patis kws nyob huv lub nroog Nkalimes yuav lawm.
Muaj tuabneeg huv lub nroog Xifes tuaj cuag Xa-ules huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as hab qha rua Xa-ules has tas, “Daviv nkaum sau lub Roob Hakhilas ntawm ntug taj mojsaab qhua huv tebchaws Yudas.”
Taamsim ntawd, Xa-ules txawm coj peb txheeb leej tubrog Yixalayees kws nwg xaiv tseg lawm, moog nrhav Daviv ntawm taj mojsaab qhua Xifes,
Xa-ules moog tsuam chaw su rua ntawm ntug kev sau lub Roob Hakhilas. Thaus Daviv tseem nyob huv taj mojsaab qhua, nwg tub paub lawm has tas, Xa-ules tuaj nrhav nwg.
Daviv txhaj tso tuabneeg moog soj hab pum Xa-ules tuaj nyob sau lawm tag,

Taamsim ntawd, Daviv txawm moog pum Xa-ules hab Neles tug tub Aneles kws yog Xa-ules tug thawj tubrog lub chaw pw ntawm qhov ntawd tag. Xa-ules lub chaw pw nyob huv plawv, hab Xa-ules cov tubrog tej chaw pw nyob puagncig nwg.

Daviv nug Ahimelej kws yog tuabneeg Hitis, hab Anpisais kws yog Yau-as tug kwv has tas, “Meb leejtwg kaam nrug kuv moog rua huv Xa-ules lub chaw?” Anpisais teb has tas, “Kuv nrug koj moog.” (Yau-as hab Anpisais obtug nam hu ua Xeluyas.)

Yog le mo ntawd, Daviv hab Anpisais txawm moog rua huv Xa-ules lub chaw, hab pum Xa-ules pw tsaug zug huv plawv, nwg muab nwg raab muv txhus rua huv aav ze ntawm nwg taubhau. Aneles hab cov tubrog pw tsaug zug pawg lug puagncig Xa-ules.

Anpisais has rua Daviv has tas, “Mo nuav Vaajtswv tub muab koj tug yeebncuab cob rua koj teg lawm, thov ca kuv muab nwg raab muv rov nkaug nwg kuas tshaab plawg rua huv aav, tsi taag yuav loos ntxiv le lawm.”
Tabsis Daviv has tas, “Koj tsi xob tua nwg! Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua tug tuabneeg kws tua tug vaajntxwv kws tug TSWV tsaa.”
Daviv has ntxiv tas, “Kuv paub has tas, tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob, nwg yeej yuav muab Xa-ules tua povtseg, tsi has nwg yuav tuag rua huv tshaav rog lossis tuag le caag los yeej yog tug TSWV tua.
Thov tug TSWV paab kuas kuv tsi xob ua phem rua tug kws tug TSWV tsaa ua vaajntxwv lawm! Ca le muab nwg raab muv hab nwg lub taub dlej nqaa moog xwb.”

Yog le ntawd, Daviv txawm muab raab muv hab lub taub dlej kws nyob ze ntawm Xa-ules taubhau ib saab, ces Daviv hab Anpisais txawm coj tsiv moog lawm. Tsi muaj leejtwg pum lossis paub tej xwm nuav lossis tsi muaj leejtwg tsim le, puab puavleej tsaug zug ntsag tu, rua qhov tug TSWV ua rua puab tsaug zug heev.
Daviv hlaa haav moog rua saab tim u, moog sawv sau lub pov roob kws nyob nrug dleb tsawv,
hab qw rua Xa-ules cov tubrog hab Aneles has tas, “Aneles, koj Puas nov?” Aneles teb has tas, “Koj yog leejtwg? Koj tsaa vaajntxwv ua dlaabtsi?”

Daviv teb has tas, “Aneles, koj tsi yog ib tug tuabneeg tseemceeb huv cov Yixalayees los? Ua caag koj tsi zuv koj tug vaajntxwv zoo? Nyavnyuas muaj ob tug tuabneeg nkaag lug rua huv mej lub chaw pw yuav tua mej tug vaajntxwv.

Aneles, yog ua num le ko xwb, tsi taag ua los tau! Kuv coglug rua tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob has tas, tsimnyog muab koj hab koj cov tuabneeg tua povtseg huv tuabsi, rua qhov mej tsi zuv mej tug vaajntxwv kws tug TSWV tsaa. Mej saib! Vaajntxwv raab muv hab lub taub dlej kws nyob ntawm nwg taubhau ib saab dlua qhov twg lawm?”
Xa-ules paub Daviv lub suab, nwg txhaj nug has tas, “Tub Daviv, yog koj los?” Daviv teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, yog kuv los mas.”
Daviv has ntxiv tas, “Kuv tug tswv, ua le caag koj pheej caum koj tug tubkhai tua? Kuv tau ua le caag? Kuv tau ua txhum dlaabtsi?

Vaajntxwv, thov koj noog kuv has. Yog tug TSWV kuas koj tawmtsaam kuv, thov tug TSWV hloov sab txais yuav tej kws kuv muab fij rua nwg; tabsis yog tuabneeg kuas koj ua yeebncuab rua kuv, thov tug TSWV foom tsi zoo rua puab. Rua qhov puab tau ntab kuv tawm huv tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg lub tebchaws moog nyob rua lwm lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav tau pe luas tej vaajtswv.

Thov tsi xob ca luas tua kuv rua huv lwm tsaav tuabneeg lub tebchaws kws nyob dleb ntawm tug TSWV. Vim le caag cov Yixalayees tug vaajntxwv tuaj caum tua kuv kws zoo le tug dlev mub xwb? Ua caag nwg caum kuv tua ib yaam le caum noog tua?”
Xa-ules teb has tas, “Tub Daviv, kuv tau ua txhum lawm! Koj ca le rov qaab lug, kuv yuav tsi ua phem rua koj lawm, rua qhov mo nuav koj tau tseg kuv txujsa. Kuv ruag heev hab ua phem kawg le!”
Daviv teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, koj raab muv nyob ntawm nuav, kuas koj cov tuabneeg ib tug tuaj nqaa moog.

Tug TSWV yeej muab nqe zug rua tug kws muab sab npuab nwg hab ua ncaaj nceeg. Nub nua tug TSWV tub muab koj cob rua kuv teg lawm, tabsis kuv tsi ua phem rua koj, tug kws yog tug TSWV tsaa ua vaajntxwv.
Nub nua kuv tseg koj txujsa le caag, thov tug TSWV ua ib yaam le ntawd rua kuv, hab paab kuas kuv dlim ntawm tej kev txomnyem ntxhuv sab nuav.”
Xa-ules has rua Daviv has tas, “Mivtub, thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua koj, kuas txhua yaam kws koj ua yuav vaammeej!” Yog le ntawd, Daviv txawm ncaim moog hab Xa-ules rov qaab lug tsev lawm.

Daviv xaav has tas, “Muaj ib nub twg Xa-ules yuav muab kuv tua povtseg xwb. Qhov zoo ces kuv yuav tau tsiv moog nyob huv tebchaws Filitees kuas Xa-ules tso tseg tsi nrhav kuv tua huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav lawm, kuv txhaj yuav tau nyob tso sab lug.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg rau pua leej txhaj moog cuag Ma-aus tug tub Akhises kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Nkas.

Daviv cov tuabneeg hab puab cov quaspuj mivnyuas nyob huv lub nroog Nkas. Daviv coj nwg ob tug quaspuj kws yog Ahinau-as kws nyob huv lub nroog Yexelees hab Anpinkayis kws yog Nanpaas tug quaspuj kws nyob huv lub nroog Kalemees nrug nwg moog hab.
Thaus Xa-ules nov has tas, Daviv tsiv moog nyob huv lub nroog Nkas, nwg txawm tso tseg tsi moog caum Daviv tua lawm.
Daviv has rua Akhises has tas, “Yog koj txaus sab rua kuv, thov koj pub ib thaaj aav rua kuv ua nroog nyob. Tsi xob ca kuv nrug koj nyob huv lub tuamceeb nroog nuav.”
Yog le ntawd, Akhises txhaj muab lub nroog Xikelas rua Daviv, tub yog vim le ntawd, lub nroog Xikelas txhaj yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Yudas tug lug txug naj nub nua.
Daviv nyob huv tebchaws Filitees tau ib xyoos hab plaub hlis.

Lub sijhawm ntawd Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tau moog tua cov Nkesus, cov Nkixis hab cov Amalej kws ibtxwm nyob cheebtsaam ntawd tau ntau tam lug lawm. Daviv pheej tua hab fuab puab tej tebchaws le ntawd moog txug rua Sus hab moog ti nkaus nraag cov Iziv tug nrimteb,
Daviv muab tej quaspuj hab tej txivneej tua tuag taag, hab nteg tej yaaj, tej nyuj, tej neeg luav, tej ntxhuav caab hab nqaa puab tej tsoog tsho huv tuabsi lug. Daviv rov lug cuag Akhises,

Akhises nug Daviv has tas, “Nub nua koj moog fuab tej nuav qhov twg lug?” Daviv qha rua Akhises has tas, “Kuv moog rua tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb, moog rua huv xeem Yelamees cheebtsaam aav hab moog rua cheebtsaam kws cov Kenais nyob.”
Daviv muab tej quaspuj txivneej tua tuag taag, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg moog qha tej kws Daviv ua ntawd rua huv lub nroog Nkas. Tej nuav yog tej kws Daviv ua thaus nwg nyob huv tebchaws Filitees.
Akhises ntseeg Daviv sab hab has tas, “Nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees ntxub nwg heev, mas nwg yeej yuav ua num rua kuv moog taag nwg simneej le.”
Tom qaab ntawd, cov Filitees txawm txhij puab cov tubrog tuaj tua cov Yixalayees. Akhises has rua Daviv has tas, “Koj yeej paub has tas, koj hab koj cov tuabneeg yuavtsum moog paab kuv tua rog.”

Daviv teb has tas, “Kuv yog koj tug tubkhai, kuv yuav moog paab koj, nyaj koj yuav pum has tas kuv moog ua tau num npaum le caag” Akhises teb has tas, “Zoo lawm! Kuv yuav tsaa koj ua tug zuv kuv moog ib simneej le.”

Xamuyees tub tuag hab cov Yixalayees tub tuaj paam nwg hab muab nwg log rua huv nwg lub nroog Lamas lawm. Xa-ules tub muab cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib yaig, hab txawj txheev dlaab ntab huv tebchaws Yixalayees moog taag lawm.
Cov tubrog Filitees tuaj tsuam yeej ze ntawm lub nroog Sunees; hab Xa-ules txhij cov tubrog Yixalayees moog tsuam yeej rua sau lub Roob Nkinpau-as.
Thaus Xa-ules pum cov tubrog Filitees, nwg ntshai heev,

Yog le ntawd, nwg txhaj nug tug TSWV saib yuav ua le caag. Tabsis tug TSWV tsi teb Xa-ules le, tsi has ua ywgtoog pum lossis saib lub Ulees hab lub Thumees lossis kuas cov cev Vaajtswv lug lug qha le.
Xa-ules has rua nwg cov numtswv has tas, “Mej ca le moog nrhav ib tug quaspuj kws txawj txheev dlaab rua kuv, kuv yuav moog cuag nwg.” Puab teb has tas, “Muaj ib tug nyob huv lub nroog Edaules.”

Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules txawm naav dlua lwm yaam rig tsho ua cuav moog kuas luas tsi paub has tas yog nwg; thaus tsaus ntuj Xa-ules hab ob tug txivneej moog rua huv tug quaspuj ntawd lub tsev. Xa-ules has rua tug quaspuj ntawd tas, “Thov koj txheev dlaab tuaj qha rua kuv saib yuav muaj xwm dlaabtsi tshwm lug rua kuv yaav tom ntej, hab thov koj txheev tug txivneej kws kuv tuav npe nuav tug xyw lug.”

Tug quaspuj ntawd teb has tas, “Koj yeej paub tej kws Vaajntxwv Xa-ules tau ua taag lug lawm, nwg tub muab cov tuabneeg kws txawj saib yaig hab txawj txheev dlaab ntab tawm huv cov Yixalayees  lub tebchaws moog taag lawm. Vim le caag koj tseem tuaj ntxag kuas kuv raug luas tua povtseg hab?”
Xa-ules has tas, “Kuv tuav tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob lub npe coglug rua koj has tas, qhov kws kuv kuas koj txheev dlaab nuav, koj yuav tsi raug txim le.”
Tug quaspuj ntawd nug has tas, “Koj xaav kuas kuv txheev leejtwg?” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Xamuyees.”
Thaus tug quaspuj ntawd pum dlheev Xamuyees, nwg txawm qw nrov nrov, hab has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Koj tub yog Vaajntxwv Xa-ules ntaag, ua caag koj tseem tuaj dlaag kuv hab?”
Vaajntxwv has rua tug quaspuj ntawd tas, “Koj tsi xob ntshai, koj pum dlaabtsi?” Tug quaspuj ntawd teb has tas, “Kuv pum ib tug xyw tawm huv aav lug.”

Xa-ules nug has tas, “Nwg zoo le caag?” Tug quaspuj ntawd teb has tas, “Nwg yog ib tug yawm laug kws naav ib lub tsho ntev.” Ces Xa-ules paub has tas, yog Xamuyees ntaag. Xa-ules txhaj txhus caug ndlua rua huv aav hawm.

Xamuyees has rua Xa-ules tas, “Koj tuaj txob kuv ua dlaabtsi? Vim le caag koj txhaj hu kuv tawm lug?” Xa-ules teb has tas, “Kuv taabtom muaj kev ntxhuv sab heev! Cov Filitees txhij tubrog tuaj tua kuv, hab Vaajtswv tso kuv tseg lawm, nwg tsi teb kuv, tsi has ua ywgtoog pum lossis tso cov cev Vaajtswv lug lug qha. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tuaj hu koj, saib koj yuav qha kuv ua le caag txhaj zoo.”
Xamuyees teb has tas, “Vim le caag koj tuaj hu kuv thaus tug TSWV tub muab koj tso tseg hab ua yeebncuab rua koj lawm?
Tug TSWV ua rua koj lawv le tej lug kws nwg kuas kuv has rua koj lawm; nwg tub muab lub tebchaws tshem tawm ntawm koj hab muab rua Daviv kaav lawm.
Tug TSWV kuas koj tua cov Amalej hab rhuav txhua yaam kws puab muaj huv tuabsi povtseg, tabsis koj tsi ua lawv le tug TSWV has, nwg txhaj ua le nuav rua koj.
Tug TSWV yuav muab koj hab cov Yixalayees cob rua cov Filitees teg. Pigkig koj hab koj cov tub yuav moog nrug kuv nyob, hab tug TSWV yuav muab cov tubrog Yixalayees cob rua cov Filitees teg.”
Thaus Xa-ules nov Xamuyees has le ntawd, nwg ntshai heev hab qaug ntawg rua huv aav taamsim ntawd. Xa-ules tsaug heev, rua qhov nwg tsi noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le tau ib nub hab ib mos lawm.
Tug quaspuj kws txheev dlaab ntawd moog xauj, nwg pum Xa-ules ntshai kawg nkaus le, tug quaspuj ntawd has rua Xa-ules has tas, “Kuv pheej moo muab kuv txujsa paab koj lawv le koj thov kuas kuv ua.
Thov koj ua lawv le kuv has, ca kuv ua mivntsiv mov rua koj noj. Koj yuavtsum noj mov, koj txhaj muaj zug taug kev moog.”
Xa-ules tsi kaam noj hab has tas, “Kuv yuav tsi noj ib yaam dlaabtsi le.” Tabsis nwg cov tubkhai txhob kuas nwg yuavtsum noj xwb. Thaus kawg Xa-ules txhaj sawv huv aav lug nyob sau txaaj.
Tug quaspuj ntawd txawm moog nteg tug mivnyuas nyuj kws nwg muab fwb ca lug tua ua nqaj ua no, nwg muab moov nplej zuaj ua ib cov ncuav tsi xyaw keeb muab ci kag sav.
Nwg coj cov zaub mov ntawd moog rua Xa-ules hab nwg obtug tubkhai noj. Mo ntawd thaus puab noj mo taag puab txawm rov lug tsev lawm.
Cov Filitees sau taagnrho puab cov tubrog tuaj txoos rua ntawm Afes, hab cov tubrog Yixalayees tsuam yeej rua ntawm lub qhovdlej txhawv kws nyob huv lub Haav Yexelees.
Cov Filitees tsib tug vaajntxwv nrug puab cov tubrog ua ke tuaj tsheej paab, tej paab ib puas leej, hab tej paab ib txheeb leej; Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg nrug Vaajntxwv Akhises ua qaab.

Thaus cov thawj tubrog Filitees pum Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg, puab nug has tas, “Cov tuabneeg Henplais tuaj ua dlaabtsi ntawm nuav?” Akhises teb has tas, “Tug nuav yog Daviv kws yog Vaajntxwv Xa-ules kws kaav tebchaws Yixalayees ib tug thawj tubrog. Nwg tub lug nrug kuv nyob tau ib ntus lawm. Txij thaus nwg lug nrug kuv nyob, kuv tsi pum nwg ua txhum dlaabtsi le.”

Tabsis cov thawj tubrog Filitees npautawg heev rua Akhises hab has tas, “Ca le kuas nwg rov moog nyob rua huv lub nroog kws koj muab rua nwg. Tsi pub nwg nrug peb moog ntaus rog; nyob tsaam nwg ntxeev sab rov tawmtsaam peb thaus peb tseem taabtom sis tua. Rua qhov thaus ntawd, yog lub sijhawm zoo rua nwg tua hab txav peb cov tubrog tej taubhau coj moog rua nwg tug tswv kuas nyam nwg.
Tug nuav tub yog tug Daviv kws cov quaspuj seev cev hu nkauj qhuas has tas, ‘Xa-ules tua tuag quas txheeb leej xwb, tabsis Daviv tua tuag quas vaam leej.’ ”

Akhises hu Daviv lug hab has tas, “Kuv tuav cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob lub npe coglug rua koj has tas, koj yeej tau ua zoo rua kuv; kuv yeej txaus sab ca koj nrug kuv moog tua rog. Txij nub kws koj lug nrug kuv nyob kuv tsi pum koj ua ib qhov txhum le. Tabsis lwm tug vaajntxwv tsi pum zoo koj nrug peb moog.
Yog le ntawd, thov koj ca le rov moog tsev zoo sab hlo, hab tsi xob ua tej yaam kws tsiv puab sab le.”

Daviv teb has tas, “Vaajntxwv, kuv tau ua txhum dlaabtsi? Koj tub has tas, txij thaus kuv lug nrug koj nyob ua num rua koj, koj tsi pum kuv ua ib qho txhum le, vim le caag txhaj tsi pub kuv nrug koj kws yog kuv tug tswv hab kuv tug vaajntxwv moog tua koj cov yeebncuab?”
Akhises teb has tas, “Kuv yeej pum zoo. Kuv pum has tas koj yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg ib yaam le Vaajtswv ib tug timtswv. Tabsis lwm tug vaajntxwv has tas tsi pub koj nrug peb moog tua rog.
Yog le ntawd, pigkig koj hab koj cov tuabneeg kws tsiv Xa-ules tuaj nrug kuv nyob, ca le rov moog thaus pum kev txoog.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg txhaj sawv ntxuv rov lug rua huv tebchaws Filitees, hab cov tubrog Filitees moog rua Yexelees lawm.

Ua ntej ob nub kws Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg rov lug txug huv lub nroog Xikelas. Cov Amalej tub tuaj tua hab fuab tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb hab lub nroog Xikelas lawm. Puab muab suavtawg hlawv lub nroog,
hab nteg taagnrho cov quaspuj; puab tsi tua ib tug le, tabsis puab coj txhua tug, tsi has tug laug tug hluas nrug puab moog lawm.
Thaus Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg lug txug, puab pum lub nroog Xikelas kub nyab taag, hab luas coj puab tej quaspuj, tej tub hab tej ntxhais moog taag lawm.
Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg tsaa suab hlo quaj tsi ntsag moog txug thaus puab zug ntaug taag.
Txawm yog Daviv ob tug quaspuj kws yog Ahinau-as hab Anpinkayis los luas coj moog huv tuabsi lawm.

Daviv nyuaj sab kawg le, rua qhov nwg cov tuabneeg tej tub tej ntxhais raug luas nteg lawm; puab ntxhuv sab heev, puab has tas puab yuav muab pobzeb ntaus Daviv. Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog Daviv tug Vaajtswv txhawb Daviv tug zug.
Daviv has rua tug povthawj Anpiyathas kws yog Ahimelej tug tub has tas, “Coj lub Efaus lug rua kuv.” Ces Anpiyathas txhaj coj lub efaus lug rua Daviv.

Daviv nug tug TSWV has tas, “Puas tsimnyog kuv moog caum cov tuabneeg tubsaab ntawd? Hab kuv puas yuav caum cuag puab?” Tug TSWV teb has tas, “Koj ca le moog, koj yeej yuav caum cuag puab hab cawm tau cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg lawm.”
Yog le ntawd, Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg rau pua leej txhaj sawv kev moog. Thaus puab moog txug ntawm tug Dlej Npexaus, puab tseg ibtxha nyob rua ntawd.
Daviv hab nwg cov tuabneeg plaub puas leej caum moog ntxiv; ob puas leej kws muab tso tseg ntawd qaug zug heev, hlaa tsi taug dlej moog rua saab tid.
Daviv cov tuabneeg moog ntsib ib tug tub hluas Iziv tom taj nraag, hab puab coj nwg lug cuag Daviv. Puab muab ncuav rua nwg noj, muab dlej rua nwg haus,
muab ob peb lub txiv ncuav pas qhuav hab ob pob txiv maab qhuav rua nwg. Thaus nwg noj taag nwg txhaj rov muaj zug tuaj, rua qhov nwg tsi muaj dlaabtsi noj lossis haus tau peb nub lawm.

Daviv nug nwg has tas, “Koj tug tswv yog leejtwg, hab koj tuaj qhov twg tuaj?” Nwg teb has tas, “Kuv yog tuabneeg Iziv, hab kuv yog ib tug tuabneeg Amalej tug qhev. Kuv tug tswv muab kuv tso tseg tau peb nub rua ntawm nuav, rua qhov kuv mob.
Peb moog fuab cov Kheletis kws nyob rua cheebtsaam huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb, peb fuab cheebtsaam kws Kalej cuab kwvtij nyob hab peb muab suavtawg hlawv lub nroog Xikelas kub nyab taag.”

Daviv nug has tas, “Koj puas kaam coj kuv moog caum cov tuabneeg tubsaab ntawd?” Nwg teb has tas, “Tau kawg, yog koj tuav Vaajtswv lub npe coglug has tas, koj yuav tsi muab kuv tua povtseg lossis muab kuv cob rua kuv tug tswv.”

Nwg txhaj coj Daviv moog caum puab. Cov tubsaab ntawd moog nyob pawg lug ntawm ib thaaj chaw, puab noj haus hab zoo sab, rua qhov puab moog fuab tau khoom ntau heev huv tebchaws Filitees hab tebchaws Yudas lug.
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Daviv txawm tua cov tuabneeg tubsaab ntawd moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj tuag taag, tsuas tshuav plaub puas leej tub hluas kws caij ntxhuav tsiv dlim lawm xwb.
Daviv txeeb tau nwg cov tuabneeg txhua tug hab txhua yaam kws cov Amalej fuab moog lawm, hab Daviv ob tug quaspuj rov lug huv tuabsi;
tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi pluj le. Daviv coj tau nwg cov tuabneeg tej tub tej ntxhais hab txhua yaam kws cov Amalej fuab moog lawm huv tuabsi rov qaab lug.
Daviv coj tau taagnrho puab tej nyuj, tej yaaj hab tej tshis rov qaab lug; Daviv cov tuabneeg caab tej tsaj ntawd moog ua puab ntej  hab has tas, “Tej tsaj nuav yog Daviv tug.”

Daviv rov lug txug ntawm ob puas leej kws qaug zug hab tsi nrug nwg moog kws nwg muab tso tseg rua ntawm tug Dlej Npexaus. Cov ntawd tuaj tog Daviv hab cov kws nrug nwg moog. Daviv lug rua ntawm puab hab has lug noj qaab nyob zoo rua puab.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nrug Daviv moog, muaj qee leej kws tsi txawj xaav hab tsi paub qaabhau has tas, “Puab tsi nrug peb moog, peb yuav tsi faib tej khoom kws peb moog txeeb tau lug rua puab. Puab tsuas coj tau puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas moog xwb.”
Tabsis Daviv teb has tas, “Kuv cov kwvtij, mej tsi xob ua le ntawd, tej khoom nuav yog tej kws tug TSWV muab pub rua peb! Tug TSWV yog tug tsomkwm hab pub peb moog tua yeej cov tubsaab ntawd.
Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg pum zoo tej kws mej has ko le. Yuavtsum faib kuas txhua tug tau sis npaug, tsi has cov kws nyob tom qaab saib peb tej khoom hab cov kws tau moog tua rog.”
Daviv muab qhov nuav ua ib txuj cai rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees coj, txij thaus ntawd lug txug naj nub nua.

Thaus Daviv rov lug txug huv lub nroog Xikelas, nwg muab tej khoom kws nwg txeeb tau lug ntawd ibtxha xaa moog rua nwg cov phoojywg kws yog cov Yudas tej thawjcoj hab has tas, “Tej nuav yog tej kws kuv moog txeeb tau ntawm tug TSWV cov yeebncuab lug xaa tuaj pub rua mej.”

Daviv xaa ib co moog pub rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Npethees, xaa ib co rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Lamas kws nyob huv tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb hab nwg tseem xaa ib co moog rua cov nroog nuav: Yatis,
Alu-es, Xifemaus, Ethemaus
hab Lakas; xaa ib co moog rua cuab Yelamees, cuab Kenais
hab xaa ib co moog rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Haumas, lub nroog Npaulasas, lub nroog Athas
hab lub nroog Henploos. Daviv xaa tej khoom ntawd moog rua txhua qhov kws nwg hab nwg cov tuabneeg tau moog ntoj moog thuv luas lawm.

Cov Filitees hab cov Yixalayees sis tua sau lub Roob Kinpau-as. Cov Yixalayees raug tua tuag coob heev rua sau, cov kws seem tuag nyag tsiv nyag moog lawm, Vaajntxwv Xa-ules hab nwg peb tug tub los tsiv taag lawm hab.
Tabsis cov Filitees moog caum nteg tau puab hab muab Xa-ules peb tug tub kws yog Yaunathaas, Anpinadas hab Makhisesuas tua tuag taag.
Suavdlawg sis tua nyaav heev puagncig Xa-ules. Yeebncuab tua xub neevnti tuaj raug Xa-ules saab kawg le.

Xa-ules has rua tug tub hluas kws nqaa nwg raab ntaaj hab raab muv has tas, “Ca le rhu koj raab ntaaj lug tua kuv kuas tuag, cov Filitees kws tsi ua kevcai txav txhaj tsi khaav has tas yog puab tua kuv.” Tabsis tug tub hluas ntawd ntshai heev, nwg tsi muaj cuabkaav ua le Xa-ules has. Xa-ules txhaj rhu Xa-ules raab ntaaj lug cuab hab qhau cev moog npuj raab ntaaj.
Thaus tug tub hluas ntawd pum has tas, Xa-ules tuag lawm, nwg txawm rhu nwg raab ntaaj lug cuab hab qhau cev moog npuj raab ntaaj chob nwg tuag nrug Xa-ules lawm hab.
Yog le ntawd, Xa-ules, nwg peb tug tub, tug tub hluas kws nqaa Xa-ules raab ntaaj hab raab muv hab Xa-ules cov tuabneeg txhaj tuag taag rua nub ntawd.

Thaus cov Yixalayees kws nyob ntawm lub haav Yexelees saab tim, hab cov kws nyob ntawm tug dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj, nov has tas cov tubrog Yixalayees swb, Xa-ules hab nwg peb tug tub los raug luas tua tuag taag lawm, puab txawm tsiv tso puab tej vaaj tse tseg. Cov Filitees txhaj tuaj nyob huv puab tej nroog.
Nub tom qaab cov Filitees txawm moog dlaws cov tubrog Yixalayees kws tuag tej khoom, puab pum Xa-ules hab nwg peb tug tub tuag rua sau lub Roob Kinpau-as.

Puab txav Xa-ules lub taubhau, hle nwg cev rig tsho tooj, nwg tej cuabyeej ua rog nqaa moog hab xaa xuv moog thoob plawg tebchaws Filitees hab qha txuj xuv zoo rua puab tej mlom hab puab cov tuabneeg.
Puab nqaa Xa-ules tej cuabyeej ua rog moog tso rua huv lub tsev kws puab teev tug mlom quaspuj Atates hab puab muab Xa-ules lub cev dlai rua ntawm lub nroog Npes Saas tug ntsaa yeej.
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yanpes huv tebchaws Nkile-as nov tej kws cov Filitees ua rua Xa-ules ntawd,
cov tuabneeg kws sab tawv txawm maub ib mos moog rua huv lub nroog Npes Saas, puab muab Xa-ules hab nwg peb tug tub lub cev sau tug ntsaa yeej txu lug hab kwv moog hlawv rua huv lub nroog Yanpes.
Puab muab Xa-ules hab nwg peb tug tub cov pobtxhaa coj moog log rua ntawm qaab tsob ntoo tamalis huv lub nroog Yanpes, hab puab ua kevcai yoo mov tau xyaa nub.
